src: 觉得很有意义的一本证书——急救证
tgt: A certificate I deem meaningful, Certificate of First Aid
hypo: A certificate that they deem meaningful - First Aid Certificate

src: 这是我除了驾驶证之外一本觉得重要的技能证书之一！
tgt: I think this is one of the most important skill type certificate except for driving license!
hypo: This is one of the important skills certificates I think is more important than my driving license!

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
tgt: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
hypo: 的普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前抢救。在发生紧急事件时，迅速采取急救措施是非常重要的。如果患者处于危急状态，应立即呼叫紧急救援，如拨打急救电话或前往最近的医院急诊室。在救护车抵达之前，医生和护士将采取行动，包括进行紧急救治、紧急检查和必要的紧急护理。因此，及时采取急救措施是非常重要的，以确保患者的生命安全。

src: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
tgt: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
hypo: As everyone knows, there is a certain period of time during which ambulance arrives after the accident, and this is the most critical period.

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
tgt: This period is the most important time for first aid.
hypo: This is the time when there is a need for emergency medical treatment.

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
tgt: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
hypo: If I really experienced a heart attack, blood clot, and respiratory arrest, then our window of life is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
tgt: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
hypo: So it is important to know how to handle first aid when around people!

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
tgt: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
hypo: When someone falls near us, we can use our professional knowledge to save them, instead of standing there不动 and doing nothing, which is so frightening.

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
tgt: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
hypo: According to official data, a total of 30 million people die annually as a result of accidents, with the most dangerous being cardiac arrest.

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
tgt: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
hypo: On average, 15% of the whole US population can be saved.

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
tgt: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
hypo: In Las Vegas赌场酒店， more than 80% can be saved, while Shanghai and Beijing are below 1%.

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
tgt: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
hypo: This is said by Lu Le, the founder of First反应.

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
tgt: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
hypo: If a person has a cardiac arrest, there is no breath left, and there is no heartbeat, even pinching theirphiltrum will not help.

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
tgt: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
hypo: It is necessary to perform artificial respiration and chest compressions in order to save the person's life.

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
tgt: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
hypo: I have found that very few people currently have this awareness to study first aid, but when accidents occur, it is too late. Therefore, I call on everyone to study this skill so that we can respond promptly in situations where accidents occur.

src: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
tgt: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
hypo: Maybe we can save an life!

src: 急救证可以在你们当地的红十字会培训中心报名，我是在珠海的红十字会培训中心报名的，学生还有优惠呢。
tgt: People can apply for the certificate of first aid at your local Red Cross Training Center, and I applied for my certificate at the Red Cross Training Center in Zhuhai; students are offered with a discount.
hypo: emergency medical training course can apply at your local Red Cross training center. I applied for the course in Zhuhai, and students are given discounts.

src: PS：最后一张图是记录自己25岁前要完成的目标的，把急救证加入目标清单也是几个月前的事情，但是确实是完成了呀！
tgt: PS: The last picture is the goals I aim to achieve before 25 years old; I added the Certificate of First Aid a couple months ago, but I did achieve it!
hypo: The final picture is a record of the goals I need to achieve before the age of 25. It was also a few months ago when I added First Aid certification to my goal list, but I did achieve it!

src: 接着要去考其他想考的证书了，打算去考个潜水证，之前在小红书看到还有个潜水急救证，考这个证好像还得有急救证才可以去考，所以其实急救证还是很有用的！
tgt: Next, I will apply for other certificates; I plan to get Diving Certificate; I saw on Red earlier that there is a Diving First Aid Certificate, which requires a Certificate of First Aid first, so getting a Certificate of First Aid is useful!
hypo: I will proceed to take on other certifications I'd like to pursue. I plan to obtain a diving certification. I previously saw a Diving First Aid certification on Xiaohongshu, but it appears that obtaining this certification requires a First Aid Certificate. Therefore, in fact, a First Aid Certificate is still very useful!

src: 1.本店合作快递公司，
tgt: 1. Cooperating delivery companies of our store,
hypo: Our store collaborates with a快递公司.

src: 1）合作快递以旺旺签名为准！
tgt: 1) Refer to our Ali Want slogan for our cooperating delivery companies!
hypo: 1) The cooperation express delivery is subject to our signature on this message!

src: 2）顺丰快递
tgt: 2) SF-express
hypo: 2) SF-express

src: 2.买家急需产品或有时效限制，建议选择顺风快递，建议到付，顺丰相对有所保证，修改运费后再付款。
tgt: 2. It is recommended to choose SF-express delivery with payment upon arrival for buyers who need the products urgently or need to receive it within a time range; SF is relatively secure and you may pay after the shipping fee is edited.
hypo: If the buyer needs the product quickly or has time-sensitive delivery requirements, it's recommended to choose SF-express. It is recommended to pay for the order in advance. SF-express offers relatively better delivery security and can make payment after modifying the shipping fee.

src: 3.买家对本店的运费收取有疑问，可选运费到付。
tgt: 3. If you have doubts about the shipping fee of our store, you may choose payment upon arrival.
hypo: 3. The buyer may have any questions about the shipping fee charged by the seller, and it is available to be paid by shipping fees at the time of delivery.

src: 4.重物产品一般发物流，另行联系。
tgt: 4. Heavy products are sent by express companies; please contact us separately.
hypo: For heavy products, the shipment is usually sent through logistics, and further contact is needed.

src: 1.本店支持7天退换货服务，由于产品质量及发错数量问题，本店承担运费。
tgt: 1. Our store supports seven-day return and exchange service; our store will bear the freight if there is a problem of product quality or if the quantity of products is wrong.
hypo: 1. Our store supports a 7-day return and exchange service. However, due to the issue of product quality and incorrect quantity sent, freight charges are responsible by our store.

src: 2.非产品本身质量问题，由于买家选错型号及其他因素需要退换货，在不影响产品本身功能没有问题及不影响二次销售的，本店支持除运费外的免费退换货服务，来回运费运费需要买件承担。
tgt: 2. If you need to exchange or return the products due to reasons other than the quality of the product itself, such as the buyer choosing the wrong model or other factors, our store supports free exchange and return services under the condition that the function of the products or a second sale is not affected, and the shipping fee back and forth shall be borne by the buyer.
hypo: 2. For non-product-related reasons, customers may need to return or exchange products due to a wrong model selection by the buyer. Our store offers free return and exchange services, without any additional fees, provided that the products do not have any negative effects on the functionality and are not suitable for second-sales. The return and shipping costs for the entire journey must be borne by the buyer.

src: 3.本店不支持以快递延误而造成需要退货，且需要卖家承担运费诉求。
tgt: 3. Our store does not support return of product and the appeal for the seller to bear the shipping fee due to delay of express delivery.
hypo: This store does not support appeals for returns due to delivery delays, and the seller is required to cover the transportation cost.

src: 4.定制产品非质量问题不予退换货。
tgt: 4. Exchange or return of customized products is not supported unless there is quality issue.
hypo: 4. Customized products shall not be returned or exchanged for reasons of issue.

src: 1.本品是原装正品？
tgt: 1. Is this product original and authentic?
hypo: 1. Is this product the original and authentic one?

src: 答：未注明原厂品牌的一律国产替代产品。
tgt: Answer: Those with no specified original brand are all domestic-made substitute products.
hypo: The translation for the sentence is: "We offer domestic substitute products without specifying the original brand."

src: 2.本店有仿品吗？
tgt: 2. Is there counterfeit in this store?
hypo: 2. Does this store sell replicas?

src: 答：很抱歉，本店不出售高仿产品，所谓高仿产品，具有原厂的LOGO与包装。
tgt: Answer: Sorry, our store doesn’t sell high-level counterfeit products, which have the LOGO and package of the original factory.
hypo: I'm sorry, but our store does not sell high-quality replicas. These are true high-quality replicas with the original brand logo and packaging.

src: 3.国产xxx，是原厂在中国生产的吗？
tgt: 3. Is domestic made xxx made in an original factory in China?
hypo: 3. Is this product domestic or produced by the original manufacturer in China?

src: 答：国产的是替代产品，非原厂在中国生产的产品，只是国内都沿用该说法。

src: 宜欣检查井砌块砖机设备广泛适用于煤、热、水、电、气等市政地下构筑物的新型砌筑材料。

src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
tgt: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
hypo: The advantage of using concrete blocks to form的检查井 is that the blocks are all structured with凹 and凸槽 on all four sides, which can be组合砌筑 to form a chain.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
tgt: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
hypo: The resistance of the wall between the columns is far superior to the brickwork form.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
tgt: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
hypo: The module is a hollow structure, which is assembled together. After the structure is assembled, the longitudinal holes are interconnected and the横向 holes are贯连. When the core of the holes is浇注ed, a concrete matrix is formed, providing secondary reinforcement and waterproofing functions.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
tgt: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.
hypo: The modules have槽-like holes for reinforcements in both the horizontal and vertical directions, which相应地 improve the overall strength of the structure.

src: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
tgt: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.
hypo: In addition，检查井 and排水井 constructed with concrete检查井 modules are less likely to collapse, sunk, and leak, due to their stability in mechanical performance, simple operation, and standard成形 dimensions.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。
tgt: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment can automatically control the input and output of the configured data, and the one-key contact crystal display can monitor all the process of mechanical operation to realize ideal man-machine dialogue, automatic analysis on materials, density operation, safety logic control and fault diagnosis system.
hypo: "Logic control, safety logic, configured"

src: 井壁墙体模块机械液压系统采用单缸液压、输送，双缸液压、输送。
tgt: Single-cylinder and double-cylinder hydraulic pressure and transportation are adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical and hydraulic system.
hypo: The mechanical液压系统 for the井壁墙体模块采用了单缸液压输送 and 双缸液压输送.

src: 独立的液压集成站，避免了由于主机振动对液压系统的影响，从而保证液压系统工作的可靠性。
tgt: The independent hydraulic integration station is utilized to avoid the influences on the hydraulic system caused by vibration of the master so as to ensure reliability of the operation of the hydraulic system.
hypo: An independent hydraulic integrated station avoids the impact of the main system vibration on the hydraulic system, thereby ensuring the reliability of the hydraulic system.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备布料箱行进模箱脱模上升，储料箱门关闭，自动输送托板，全部由液压系统独立完成，从而达到减少机械的磨损和维修。
tgt: In the concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, the fabric box proceeding box de-molds and lifts, the storage box door closes, and the supporting plate is transported automatically, all of which are independently completed by the hydraulic system so as to reduce mechanical abrasion and times of repair.
hypo: The brick equipment refers to the process of bricks production, which includes a brick oven, brickbat, and brick equipment.  The brick equipment has a布料箱， which is used to carry out the process of brick production. The brickbat is used to make the brick shards into a target shape. The brick equipment has a process of rising the target shape, which is achieved by the rise of the brickbat. The storage box door is closed, and automatic conveying platforms are used to transport the bricks. All of this is done using液压系统， which can reduce mechanical wear and tear and maintenance.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备采用进口电脑、电器，密封件液压件，准保设备综合性能稳定可靠。
tgt: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment is composed by imported computer and appliances, as well as sealing elements and hydraulic element to ensure stable and reliable comprehensive performance.
hypo: The brick equipment used in the concrete inspection井 modular brick machine is equipped with imported computers, electrical components, seals, and hydraulic components, ensuring the overall performance of the equipment is stable and reliable.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振平台采用整体板钢，台面线切割合模无焊接点，使填料箱自由摆动导向，充分减少机械磨损。
tgt: The integral steel plate is adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical vibration platform, with no welding points of wire-electrode cutting mold closing of mesa, so that the stuffing box can swing and orient freely to greatly reduce mechanical abrasion.
hypo: The mechanical stimulation platform for the wall module of the wellhead adopts a整体 plate steel structure, with the floor surface line sliced and machine-made without welded points, allowing the solid box to freely rotate and guide, fully minimizing mechanical abrasion.

src: 使模具负荷减少、填料并二合一加密振幅，采用一体化、全同步，台振、模振，确保达到振实效果。
tgt: It reduces loads of molds and reinforces vibration; integrated and full synchronization are adopted for vibration of the platform and the molds to ensure the vibration effect.
hypo: Reduce the load on the mold, add weight, and加密 the amplitude with integrated and fully synced vibrations, using both amplitude vibrations and frequency vibrations, and ensure that the vibration effect reaches its true nature.

src: 井壁墙体模块机械激振机械、电脑自动控制振幅根据原料性价比调节振幅，无磨损制动，从而延长使用寿命，降低成本。
tgt: The shaft wall module mechanical excitation machinery and the computer automatically control the vibration range according to the cost performance of raw materials, leading to no abrasion brake; in this way, it extends the service life and reduces the cost.
hypo: The mechanical explosive device is used to extend the shaft wall module. Computer control自动 adjusting the amplitude according to the cost-performance of raw materials. No abrasion braking, thus extending the service life and reducing cost.

src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
tgt: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
hypo: The International Olive Association divides olive oil into two categories: Virgin Olive Oil and Refined Olive Oil. It also includes it in five grades.

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
tgt: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
hypo: Un refined olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is obtained directly from fresh olive fruits through mechanical冷榨， after removing any异物 by filtering.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：

hypo: There are three levels of acidity according to different degrees of acidity.

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
tgt: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
hypo: 特级初榨橄榄油 (Extra Virgin): is the highest level and best quality橄榄油， it is a natural product.

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。

hypo: The taste is excellent, with a slight and pleasant plant fragrance, and the pH is not more than 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
tgt: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.
hypo: Fine Virgin橄榄油： slightly acidity, but no more than 2% and a pure, fragrant taste.

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
tgt: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
hypo: Ordinary Virgin橄榄油： The flavor and taste are acceptable, with an acidity level not exceeding 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
tgt: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
hypo: 精炼橄榄油 refers to refined oil obtained from early-榨橄榄油 that has a pH level greater than 3.3%, or it can be referred to as "二次油".

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
tgt: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
hypo: Regular olive oil: refined olive oil is mixed with a一定比例 of fresh olive oil to调和味道和颜色. The acidity is below 1.5%, and it has a transparent, golden color.

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
tgt: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
hypo: Refined Olive 这根油料作物在收获后经过加工处理，以去除杂质并改善其品质，最终得到精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油(Refined Olive-Pomace Oil)。

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
tgt: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.
hypo: As you may have noticed from your knowledge of grading systems, the acidity of橄榄油 is a very important indicator.

src: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
tgt: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.
hypo: 要知道，橄榄果 like grapes for wine-making, which come from different regions and橄榄果 varieties, produce橄榄油 with different standards.

tgt: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.
hypo: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil and climate conditions for olive oil production, including temperature, sunshine, humidity, and rainfall.

src: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。

hypo: In addition to the Mediterranean coast, olive trees can only be planted scatteredly in suitable areas.

src: 油橄榄的采摘月份：

src: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。
tgt: March to June each year is the time for olive trees to blossom and bear fruit, and from July to October, the fruit begins to develop and ripen, and the color of fruit will transition from green to red, purple and finally black.
hypo: From March to June every year，橄榄树 begins to bloom and give birth to fruit. From July to October, the fruits begin to grow and mature. The fruits change from green to red, blue, and finally black in color as they ripen.

src: 11月至次年2月是果实的采摘季节（橄榄油的新鲜度可是很重要的哦）。

hypo: The time period from November to February is the time for果实采摘 (the freshness of橄榄油 is very important).

src: 橄榄油的营养成分：

src: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
tgt: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid, vitamin A, vitamin B, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin K and antioxidants.
hypo: Olive oil is rich in单不饱和脂肪酸， such as 橄榄油， 亚油酸， and亚麻酸， as well as vitamins A, B, D, E, K, and antioxidants.

src: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。
tgt: Olive oil is deemed the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the oils found so far.
hypo: Olive oil is considered to be the most suitable oil for human nutrition among the oils discovered so far.

src: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
tgt: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.
hypo: In fact, there is a lot of care and attention required for girls who are slightly overweight when it comes to fashion的搭配.

src: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.
hypo: The skirt that a slightly overweight girl wears should not be too short or too long, and it should be about the same length as her膝盖. It should刚好 cover the area where her thigh is slightly overweight.

src: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
tgt: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.
hypo: A short skirt revealing the fatty areas of the legs.

src: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
tgt: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.
hypo: The phrase "过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉" can be translated into English as "Longing overly will give the impression of being short and fatty."

src: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
tgt: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.
hypo: If you divide your body into three sections by using different colors for your top, skirt, and stockings, it will give you a natural increase in height.

src: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
tgt: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.
hypo: In fact, many dark colors are a standard part of the clothing for slightly overweight girls (which the author has a personal experience of). Dark colors are also a good way to hide the fact that you have a bit of extra weight. And a elegant black short裙 is also a first choice for slightly overweight girls.

src: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
tgt: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.
hypo: Wearing dark colors, especially black short dresses, will make you look slimmer.

src: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
tgt: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.
hypo: If your calf is quite thick, do not wear your stockings and shoes too much attention-grabbing.

src: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
tgt: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.
hypo: More and more common, also no too bright colors.

src: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
tgt: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.
hypo: In order not to give the impression of being plump when people are paying attention to your legs and feet.

src: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.
hypo: It is essential to discuss the tips for dressing appropriately for slightly overweight girls.

src: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
hypo: Slightly overweight girls should never wear紧身的短裙， and their上衣 should not be too short or pushed up into the裙子， which can make them feel uncomfortable. If their legs are thick, they can wear black tights or网格 tights (with fine lines). Choose a soft and colorful flare dress with a loose- collar, and pair it with a thick-线 cloth tights or a dress with a loose- collar to effectively cover up the shortcomings of slightly overweight girls.

src: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
tgt: Of course, there are some skills for slightly overweight girls to wear short skirts.
hypo: Of course, there are also many details to consider when it comes to wearing short skirts for thin girls.

src: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
tgt: When slightly overweight girls wear short skirts, they shall choose upper outer garment with the same color as the short skirt, so as to make them look taller.
hypo: For slightly overweight girls who wear short短裙s, it's recommended to choose a上衣 with the same color as the skirt, which will give you the effect of looking taller.

src: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
tgt: Wearing skirt with a pair of high heels will make your legs seem slimmer and longer, which is the most fashionable outfit in summer!
hypo: A short skirt with high heels will make your双腿 appear even more slender and修长， which is a popular outfit for the summer!

src: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
tgt: Girls with fat upper body and slim legs shall choose short dress of luxurious style.
hypo: If you are a girl with a fat upper body but a slender lower body, I recommend choosing a dress of华丽感.

src: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
tgt: It can not only cover the fat stomach, but also show your advantages.
hypo: It can not only cover your big belly but also showcase your strengths.

src: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
tgt: A-line skirt makes people seem slimmer and is suitable for fat girls; it’s better to choose tight-fitting upper outer garment so as to form a sense of layers and make you look slimmer.
hypo: An A-line short skirt will help you to look smaller, it is particularly suitable for fat girls. You should choose a tight-fitting top, creating a sense of depth and structure will make you look smaller.

src: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
tgt: Fat girls can also try simple white T-shirt with short skirt.
hypo: Just simple white T-shirt with short skirt, even fat妹妹 can try.

src: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls can be fashionable.
hypo: Slightly overweight girls can also be fashionable.

src: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
tgt: Slightly overweight girls can be the focus of attention as long as they master the clothing matching rules.
hypo: As long as they can master the rules of dressing and styling, overweight girls will also become the center of attention.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法是什么？
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: What is the Red Label威士忌 drinker?

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
tgt: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
hypo: Each person has their own hobbies. Some like to collect, some like food, and of course, some like to taste wine. Red wine is one of the most popular苏格兰 wine in various countries, and it has won the gold award at the International Wine Competition.

src: 每一瓶红牌威士忌都有独特的味道，不过如果不知道如何品味它，岂不是糟蹋了它的醇香。
tgt: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
hypo: Every bottle of Red Label威士忌 has its own unique taste, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, it's like wasting its excellence.

src: 那么红牌威士忌怎么喝呢？
tgt: Then how do we drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky?
hypo: How do you drink red威士忌？

src: 小编为大家简单介绍下。
tgt: I’ll introduce for you now.
hypo: Please give me a brief introduction for you all. Now, I'd be happy to proceed.

src: 红牌威士忌喝法：
tgt: How to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky:
hypo: Red LabelWhisky Drinking Method:

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
tgt: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
hypo: The Red Label of尊尼获加威士忌 is blended with approximately 35 types of Scottish威士忌， resulting in a rich and savory flavor with characteristics of traditional Scottish威士忌. The flavor is full-bodied with a sweet and smoky aroma.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。
tgt: It is mellow and fresh in the mouth, with a slight taste of vanilla and strong smoked malt.
hypo: The taste is mellow and fresh, with a hint of vanilla and a strong烟熏麦芽 flavor.

src: 该酒可以直接加冰饮用，或者与最喜爱的饮品混合饮用。
tgt: The wine can be drunk directly with ice or mixed with your favorite drinks.
hypo: The wine can be drunk directly with ice, or it can be mixed with your favorite drinks.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
tgt: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
hypo: As the Red Label威士忌 enters the国内市场， it has become a timeless fashion to combine it with sparkling drinks such as Coca-Cola，雪碧， or Coca-Cola XR.

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
tgt: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
hypo: These sweet drinks, apart from中和ing the sour taste, can also bring a sense of pleasure to the eyes. Adding them to the drinks can help to dilute the alcohol scent and change the flavor.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
tgt: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
hypo: Red Label威士忌+sliced lemon+ granulated sugar (or other types of sugar) is the most authentic and traditional drink.

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
tgt: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.

tgt: As people care more about healthcare, feet bath basin has become more popular among the customers, and a large batch of products of different levels have emerged on the market, from a little more than 100 yuan up to a thousand yuan, giving the customers a lot of options.
hypo: With the increasing concern for health，足浴盆 has become increasingly popular among customers. Marketed with a wide range of products, from under $100 to over $1000, customers have ample options to choose from, providing them with a great deal of flexibility.

src: 在相关的数据表面，与传统家电相比，足浴盆等保健类家电销售火爆，但足浴盆并没有专门行业标准，因此存在一定的安全隐患。
tgt: According to related statistics, compared with traditional home appliances, the sales of healthcare products such as feet bath basin was hot, but there is no specialized industry standard for feet bath basin and so there is potential safety risk.
hypo: According to relevant statistics, compared to traditional household appliances, appliances for health, such as bath bombs, are popular. However, bath bombs do not have specific industry standards, which poses a certain risk of safety hazards.

src: “在带电的水里泡脚，实在太危险了吧!”
tgt: “Having a feet bath in the water with electricity is too dangerous!”
hypo: "B baths in带电 water is实在太危险了！"

src: 李先生告诉记者，近日，他买了一个足浴盆送给父亲做生日礼物，可是父亲泡脚时却感觉脚底发麻。
tgt: Mr. Li told reporter that he recently bought a feet bath basin for his father as a birthday present, but his father felt that the bottom of his feet were numb when using it.
hypo: 李先生 tells the journalist that recently, he bought a foot bath盆 as a birthday gift for his father, but when his father soaks his feet in the water, he feels a sense of numbness in the toes.

src: 李先生一开始以为是足浴盆的振动功能引起的，没想到关了振动功能，父亲还是感觉到脚底麻麻的。
tgt: Mr. Li first thought it was caused by the vibration function of the feet bath basin, and it was unexpected that his father still felt his feet were numb after turning off the vibration function.
hypo: initially，李先生 thought it was caused by the vibration function of the泡脚盆； however, when he turned off the vibration function, his father still felt a sense of numbness in the feet.

src: 李先生用电笔一试，电笔居然亮了，李先生惊讶地发现足浴盆的水里居然带电。
tgt: Mr. Li used a tester and the light on it was on; it was to Mr. Li’s surprise that the water in the feet bath basin was electrified.
hypo: Mr. Li tried to feel with a pen, and the pen居然亮了起来， Mr. Li was electrified to find that the water in the泡脚盆 was居然带电.

src: 后来他联络了商家，商家的态度还不错，尽管退掉了足浴盆，李先生依然感到不快。
tgt: Then he contacted the seller, whose attitude was nice, but Mr. Li still felt upset although he had returned it.
hypo: Later, he contacted the store and the store's attitude was still good. Although he had returned the足浴盆，李先生 still felt unhappy.

src: 因为他发现这个已经流行已久的足浴盆如今在最高温度的设定、适用于何种人群、何种材料保证无害等方面都没有一个明确详细的行业规定。
tgt: Because he found that feet bath basin, which has been popular for a long time, still has no explicit and detailed industry regulations on the setting of the maximum temperature, suitable crowd, what materials are safe to use, etc.
hypo: Because he discovered that there are no clear and detailed industry regulations in place for the current popular足浴盆， regarding the setting of maximum temperature, application to various groups, and ensuring无害 materials.

src: 但是一般情况下足浴盆是不会有带电问题的，但也不排除少数产品在出厂时没有严格把关。
tgt: But normally feet bath basin shouldn’t be electrified, however we can’t rule out the fact that a few products might not have been strictly checked before leaving the factory.
hypo: But normally，足浴盆 do not have electrical issues.

src: 因此在在购买的时候选择分体式的足浴盆。
tgt: Therefore, choose split type feet bath basin.
hypo: Therefore, choose a split-style bath basin when purchasing a浴盆.

src: 水电分离，没有任何安全隐患。
tgt: There is no safety risk when water and electricity are separated.
hypo: Water and electricity are separated, and there is no risk of safety hazards.

src: 同时你可以随便拿电笔测。
tgt: Meanwhile, you can use a tester to test it.
hypo: You can use any tester to test at the same time.

src: 羊行屮（chè），本名姜波，生于羊年羊月，羊行草上，适得其所，是为羊行屮，人称“羊叔”。
tgt: Yang Xingche, real name Jiang Bo, was born in the month of the sheep in the year of the sheep; the name Yang Xingche means the sheep feel most comfortable when they are on grass; people call him Uncle Yang (Sheep in Chinese).
hypo: "The sheep, Jiang Bo, was known as Yang Xingche. He was born in the month of Sheep in the Year of the Sheep. He lived on the grass and satisfied his needs perfectly, so he was called 'Sheep Master'."

src: 因出版“异域密码”系列的《泰国异闻录》《印度异闻录》《日本异闻录》《韩国异闻录》等作品，在业内有“悬疑怪才”之称，自称“擅长一本正经地胡说八道”
tgt: He is called “thriller genius” in the industry due to the publication of his “Foreign Password” series including Strange Stories in Thailand, Strange Stories in India, Strange Stories in Japan and Strange Stories in Korea, and he said that he’s “good at talking serious nonsense”
hypo: Due to the publication of stories in the "异国密码" series such as "泰国异闻录，" "印度异闻录，" "日本异闻录，" "韩国异闻录，" and "中国异闻录，" he is known within the industry as a "suspenseful strangeness specialist" and claims to be " excelling at spreading lies with a straight face."

src: 《灯下黑》，又名《中国异闻录》，“悬疑怪才”羊行屮用全新作品《灯下黑》带你深入领略中国民俗的骨髓，那些流传至今的传说，背后有怎样凄美、动人的爱恨绝唱？
tgt: Darkness under the Light, also known as Strange Stories in China, a brand new work from the “thriller genius”, allows you to experience the essence of Chinese folk customs; what are the sad, beautiful and moving stories behind the legends passed down until now?
hypo: "The Dark under the Light" (also known as "China strange stories"), is a novel by Xing Xing Yan, a famous悬疑小说家， who uses a new work called "The Dark under the Light" to guide you to explore the core of Chinese folk culture. What are the beautiful and charming emotions and爱恨绝唱 that have been passed down through the years in the stories that still exist today?

src: “异途行者”南晓楼、月无华再次开启作死的探秘之旅，他们的身世即将揭晓。

hypo: "The Unlikely Travelers"南晓楼 and "Tian Minghua" have once again embarked on an desperate quest for answers, as their true identities即将被揭开.

src: “悬疑怪才”羊行屮熬白了头发，累积百万册畅销书奉献！

src: 大美360集成家装

src: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼

src: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
tgt: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
hypo: I trusted, my friend, so I decided to go ahead and check out. At first, my budget was 7 thousands for basic renovations.

src: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
tgt: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
hypo: Upon arriving at the store, a series of scams began.

src: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
tgt: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
hypo: I first came to the store and just showed them my floor plan, but they didn't actually measure the house. They居然给我报价说 my 135-square-foot house could be done for $7,000, even though they didn't even take the time to look at the materials. They just大致看了一眼 and didn't even know what brand of materials they were using.

src: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
tgt: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
hypo: Their second scam was that they would keep pushing you to pay the deposit only when you arrived at the store (and once you made the payment, you would have no way to retrieve it, unless you had enough experience to argue with them).

src: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
tgt: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
hypo: When I was犹豫 whether to pay the deposit, they would邀请 their so-called manager to come and tell me how much discount we could give you if you just pay the deposit today.

src: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
tgt: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
hypo: This is a big trap, and I am just an example of how I was victim to fraud. I foolishly paid a total of one thousand and one hundred dollars in penalties when I was in a冲动 state.

src: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
tgt: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
hypo: His quoted price includes water and electricity, but does not include any doors, doorstops, or浴室. These three are the main components of the base installation cost.

src: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
tgt: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
hypo: In addition to these, their service points are also paid higher than those of other companies.

src: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
tgt: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
hypo: I have lost faith in this company and they didn't tell me anything at the beginning to allow me to sign a contract.

src: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
tgt: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
hypo: When I went to ask them to退钱， they showed themselves to be experienced. They had a dedicated team ready to deal with you.

src: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
tgt: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.
hypo: No matter how, I will一口咬定 that it is the customer's problem and they are entirely责备.

src: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
tgt: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.
hypo: There are various excuses for avoiding responsibility, and there are many details to discuss. I don't want to mention them all here because my friend's apartment they decorated also didn't have good quality, and they are now charging me for various expenses in the future. In short, don't choose them.

src: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
tgt: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.
hypo: It seems they have replaced the欺骗ing龙头装饰 with a much larger and beautiful one, like they've gone bankrupt and changed to something else.

src: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。

src: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。

hypo: The surrounding area is really not good, there are very few restaurant hardware stores, and the restaurant flavors are generally average.

src: 这个电梯也是很无语，跟有那大病一样，负二到负一，来回折腾，不停我按的这一层，从安全通道下去到一楼，也是很无语，直接通到一个家具店，家具店关门，安全通道出不去!
tgt: This elevator really makes people speechless; it went back and forth from B2 to B1 and did not stop on my floor, and it was ridiculous that when I went to the 1st floor from fire escape, it led to a furniture store which was closed, so I couldn’t get out from the fire escape, either!
hypo: This elevator is really无语. It's like having a serious illness. It goes from ground level (负二) to ground level (负一) back and forth, never stopping at the层 I've marked on the floor map. I also had to go down to the first floor from the safety通道 because the家具店 had closed and the safety通道 couldn't be accessed. It's like the elevator has a mind of its own and doesn't listen to me!

src: 居然之家还是需要提升，有很多地方都没有开发。
tgt: Easyhome still needs to be improved with a lot of spaces to be developed.
hypo: The home office market in China still needs to be improved, and many areas have not been developed.

src: 地址：沙依巴克区高铁北一路555号，交通方便，停车场很大，白天还是免费的。
tgt: Address: HSR North One Road, Bayishake District, convenient transportation, big parking lot free during the day.
hypo: Address: No. 555 North West Line, shaanxi region，沙依巴克区， easy transportation, large parking lot, free during day time.

src: 环境：说实话店里面积大，有8～9层，家里想买的家具、家用电器、各种小东西……，都能买到，好多名牌商家都入驻在店里，慕思、欧派、华帝、老板、峰创之家、汉斯顿、雅克、友邦、丝涟、富品居、万家乐、大自然、中联、美的、雅丹……，品牌真的是太多了，我只能记得这么多了，是购买产品的好去处，逛累了可以坐在沙发上休息休息哦。
tgt: Environment: Honestly, the store is large with 8-9 floors, where you can buy all the furniture, household appliances and small things your home needs, and many famous brands have settled in the store, such as DeRUCCI, OPPEIN, VATTI, Robam, Fengchuang Home, Hunsdon, Yake, AIA, Sealy, Fupinju, GUANGDONG MACRO, Nature, Zoomlion, Midea, Yadan, and so many other brands, I can only remember so many; it is a good place to buy products, and you can sit on the couch and have a rest if you get tired.
hypo: The environment: In fact, the store has a large layout, with 8-9 levels. You can find everything you want to buy for your home, including furniture, household appliances, and various small items... There are many famous brands入驻 in the store，慕思，欧派，华帝，老板，峰创之家，汉斯顿，雅克，友邦，丝涟，富品居，万家乐，大自然，中联，美的，雅丹... The brand list is so extensive that I can only remember so much. It's a good place to buy products, and if you're tired, you can rest on the坐在沙发上.

src: 最近想买一套舒适的沙发，朋友说这里有好多沙发可以选，看了顾家家居、美克美家的，感觉还可以，就是价格略贵，所以还在纠结中
tgt: I recently want to buy a couch and my friend said there was a lot of couch to choose from here; I looked at Kuka Home and Markor Furnishings, and I felt they were okay but a little expensive, so I am still struggling to decide.
hypo: I recently wanted to buy a comfortable couch, and my friend advised me there are many couches to choose from here. I looked at Cotton house and美克美家， and I felt that they were both good options. However, the prices are slightly higher, so I'm still纠结ing.

src: 大众点评乌鲁木齐家居卖场频道为您提供高铁居然之家地址，电话，营业时间等最新商户信息，找装修公司，就上大众点评
tgt: Dianping Urumqi Renovation and Design Channel will provide you with the address, phone number, operation time and other information of HSR Easyhome, and please come to Dianping if you are looking for a renovation company.
hypo: Dianping if Urumqi provides you with the latest商户 information such as address, phone number, working hours and more on its Urumqi家居卖场 channel. Looking for a renovation company? Look no further than Dianping if.

src: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
tgt: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
hypo: The students of Zhejiang University played the main role at the academic conference, and the research results made people's imaginations expand greatly. Xinhuanet.

src: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
tgt: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
hypo: Last night, at the opening ceremony of the 2016 academic conference of浙江大学， a series of brilliant academic achievements were honored.

src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
tgt: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
hypo: The main researchers behind these achievements are students, covering major fields such as environment, machinery, energy, healthcare, life science, and humanities. From a curious idea, students have created many high-end inventions with practical value, and some of these projects have already been awarded at home and abroad.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
tgt: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
hypo: Biosense Webster: Your Home Examination Doctor

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
tgt: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
hypo: The team of Zhang Diming, a graduate student from the Institute of Medical, Biological and Behavioral Engineering, demonstrated a biological sensor on the mobile phone's end, which was half the size of a mobile phone.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
tgt: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
hypo: You only need to breathe a little air, and this set of instruments can初步 detect the health condition from the气体 composition of your exhalation.

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
tgt: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
hypo: Zhang Di Ming said that this set of sensors is connected to a smartphone, and after blowing his nose, the health report will be displayed on the phone.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
tgt: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
hypo: 的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数，能够实时监测健康状况。

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
tgt: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
hypo: This sentence can be translated into English as follows:  This set of biological sensors uses a novel material called carbon石墨烯， which targets化学 elements. The keen "嗅觉" of this material enables it to more deeply and accurately reflect the health status of the body.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
tgt: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
hypo: Smart surgical lights：医生的高能眼睛

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
tgt: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
hypo: In addition to smartphones, smart surgical lights are also being used in operating rooms.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
tgt: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
hypo: This invention won the Best Design Award at the 44th Swiss日内瓦 International发明展览会 this year.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
tgt: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
hypo: The team of students from the School of Physics and Electronic Science and Engineering, Zhu Lin靖 and Shin Jun飞， have opened a new perspective by inventing a intelligent LED operation shadow-less灯， which can solve the problem of traditional operation light shadows.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
tgt: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
hypo: Many diseases do not receive early detection or removal, which is related to the lights used in doctors' operating rooms.

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
tgt: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
hypo: sinjinfeui said, for example, when doing early cancer inspection, if doctors are not able to see all tumor tissues in a timely manner, the癌细胞 may continue to spread after that.

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
tgt: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
hypo: This intelligent surgical lamp has four light sources, and it enhances the distinctness of different tissues under lighting by adjusting the spectrum.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
tgt: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
hypo: During the手术 process, doctors can adjust the size of the light spot, brightness level, spectral range, color balance, and shadows according to the手术 needs and personal habits at any time.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
tgt: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
hypo: This intelligent surgical lamp has been tried in Sir Run Affiliated Hospital and Children's Hospital Affiliated with浙江大学， and has received good feedback.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
tgt: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
hypo: In October last year, this invention won the first prize in the National Challenge Cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
tgt: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
hypo: Washing with air: cost-effective and cool

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
tgt: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
hypo: Most people洗手 simply uses water to rinse their hands, and may only apply soap and rinse water. However, classmates Li Xiushu and others have invented a set of "air-dry洗手装置".

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
tgt: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
hypo: Just by standing on the equipped sink, our weight can compress the air.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
tgt: “Just like an inflator.
hypo: Just like an inflator.

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
tgt: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
hypo: The air that is compressed forms a liquid at the faucet, combining with water.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
tgt: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
hypo: So that's how we can keep our hands clean!

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
tgt: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
hypo: The chromaogenic reaction and细菌残留实验证明： the effect of washing with this method is the same as that of traditional washing methods.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
tgt: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
hypo: This device can be driven only by our own gravity, ensuring a good cleaning effect while saving 90% of water. The whole process is completely energy-efficient and environmentally friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
tgt: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
hypo: Last year, at the second global major challenge summit, this invention emerged as the only gold winner among many top world universities.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
tgt: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
hypo: The pilot of modern master's and diploma program in secondary school education in 重庆 is the new employees of enterprises for students who graduate. - Xinhuanet  The modern master's and diploma program in secondary school education in 重庆 is based on the modern master's and diploma program, and students who graduate are considered as new employees of enterprises. - Xinhuanet

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
tgt: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
hypo: Last night, I was informed by the city's economic development office that from this year, our city will pilot the "modern apprenticeship" training model for professional education institutions, employing students who will also hold apprenticeship status. After enrollment, they will be预录 as unit employees of the pilot enterprises.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
tgt: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
hypo: The city education commission requires that the enrollment and hiring processes of secondary school schools and enterprises be standardized, clarifying that apprentices have a双重 status as both students and employees of the secondary school. According to the principle of mutual choice, the apprentice, the school, and the enterprise may sign a three-party协议. For apprentices aged 16 years or older but not 18 years old, the协议 must be signed by the apprentice, their guardian, the school, and the enterprise. The协议 should determine the rights and interests of all parties, as well as specific positions, learning content, and rights protection for apprentices in their professional development.

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
tgt: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
hypo: Encouraging pilot schools to adopt the modern学徒制 format to jointly conduct employee pre-shift training and post-shift training with partnering enterprises.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
tgt: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
hypo: Experimental schools want to reform the talent development model.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
tgt: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
hypo: The school and the enterprise are jointly designing a talent cultivation program, jointly developing professional teaching standards, course standards, job standards, enterprise master teacher standards, quality control standards, and corresponding implementation plans.

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
tgt: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
hypo: The pilot period is dedicated to training the curriculum, and the实习 duration of students in enterprises is determined according to the professional training plan for their respective fields. Generally, full-time实习 is通常为6 months.

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
tgt: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
hypo: In corporate practice, the corporate team-based management model should be implemented. Depending on the characteristics of different professional fields, one master can lead 2 to 5 students to form a learning team, ensuring that students master the skills required for each轮训 position.

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
tgt: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
hypo: According to arrangements, from January 2016 to August 2019, our city selected 60 pilot batches of modern master and apprentice programs in secondary and junior high schools, with around 50 students in each batch. This totalled around 3,000 students (masters and apprentices).

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
tgt: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
hypo: Under the principle of starting with pilot programs and gradually expanding to the whole area, we will establish a long-term mechanism of joint enrollment, joint training, and integrated training for students and schools, to effectively improve their job skills and increase their job satisfaction and quality.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
tgt: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
hypo: The Chinese Children's Center will hold a series of activities to make children "high-tech" to celebrate the "六一"儿童节. -新华网

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
hypo: On May 20th, a journalist from the Chinese People's News Agency in Beijing informed the Chinese Children's Center that between the first and second六一儿童节， from May 28th to June 1st, the center plans to hold a series of events including children's science and technology workshops, children's visual art festivals, and family book fairs, allowing children to experience the charm of cutting-edge technology.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
tgt: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
hypo: According to information from professionals, the activities scheduled for the "六一"儿童节 period at the China Child Education Center this year include "Love Home and Explore酷" children's future learning festival, the first children's visual arts festival, "书香嘉年华" events, and a series of storybook events for the whole family, among others.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
tgt: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
hypo: Li Zhongming, Director of the Children's Center, said at the media conference for the "6th Day of the六一儿童节" in 2016 that "Love Home and Create酷" Children's Future Learning嘉年华 was a key activity for this year's celebration of the "六一儿童节" at the Children's Center.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
tgt: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
hypo: The activity aims to reconcile social innovation with individual family creativity by incorporating various innovative educational experiences through participation by children and families. This will make innovation实践 a cultural legacy for the masses, allowing " hands-on learning" to become a new and innovative way of life and learning for a wide range of families.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
tgt: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
hypo: 据悉，“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱童萌过六一”活动、VR全民体验计划、“创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
tgt: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
hypo: 南非医生： While Ammicron's传播力 is strong, it is generally caused by intermediate cases, and is most commonly associated with mild symptoms.

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
tgt: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
hypo: Many南非 doctors and medical experts believe that the symptoms caused by the Omicron variant of the COVID-19 virus are mild compared to the Delta variant, although the spread is faster.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
tgt: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
hypo: According to a report from美联社， as Omicron variants spread in South Africa, a group of五千多名 doctors from the province of Haren in South Africa who form a physician organization reported that the symptoms of COVID-19 patients they currently treat are generally mild, including symptoms similar to those of流感， such as body aches and coughs.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
tgt: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
hypo: The director of the organization, Unben Pillay, said that he saw dozens of patients a day, but none of them needed to be hospitalized.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
tgt: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
hypo: Pillay said, "They can control the disease at home and most people recover within 10 to 14 days in isolation."

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
tgt: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
hypo: He said that this included elderly patients and those with health problems, as these populations are generally more prone to falling ill with COVID-19 and developing serious complications.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
tgt: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
hypo: He said that compared to the previous德尔塔 epidemic, the patients he treated during the Del塔 epidemic suffered from "air袜， low blood氧."

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
tgt: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
hypo: Many people will be hospitalized within days.

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
tgt: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
hypo: Within two weeks of the first report of the Omicron变异毒株 in Southern Africa, other doctors also shared similar experiences.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
tgt: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
hypo: Although it will take several weeks to collect enough data，医生的观察 and early evidence have provided some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
tgt: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
hypo: According to the South African National Institute for Communicable Diseases: among the patients who spent time in hospitals in recent weeks, only 30% have serious symptoms, half of the proportion of severe cases during the previous wave; the average stay in hospitals has been reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of recent COVID-19 patients have died, while in early cases of outbreak in South Africa, the mortality rate is as high as 20%.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
tgt: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
hypo: According to威廉·哈内科姆， Director-General of the African Health Union, " Currently, virtually all signs suggest that this is a relatively mild disease."

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
tgt: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
hypo: He also said that "It's still early, we need to obtain later data."

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
tgt: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
hypo: In general, the time for hospitalization and death usually occurs later, and we entered this wave of the epidemic only for two weeks.

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
tgt: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
hypo: At the same time, scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and the rate of hospitalization, while testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatment methods.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
tgt: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
hypo: Although Delta is still the most common strain of COVID-19 worldwide, Omicron cases are emerging in数十 countries, with南非 as the main hub of the epidemic.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
tgt: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
hypo: According to health officials, the number of new cases found in Gauteng during the first week of December increased by 400%. Testing showed that cases of the Omicron variant accounted for more than 90% of all new cases.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
tgt: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
hypo: Education News: What Can be Done to Save Abductiond Children?

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
tgt: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
hypo: If we compare the famous public service advertisement slogan "没有买卖就没有杀害，" then in a good environment without the demand for "selling and killed," the group defense and collective resistance against it make it impossible for the offense to be profitable, risky, and expensive, and thus such crimes will not happen again and again.

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
tgt: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
hypo: Ministry of Public Security, Criminal Intelligence Service, Knives Out team has launched an emergency information release platform for child disappearances.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
tgt: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
hypo: This is an internet platform designed to establish an authoritative channel for the release of child Missing Information and help to find missing children in a timely manner.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
tgt: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
hypo: Upon hearing the app's name is "Unity", I feel a strong sense of warmth.

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
tgt: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
hypo: New technological methods not only have a "文艺" name and a feeling of passion, but they also make appropriate use of information technology, practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
tgt: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
hypo: The foremost goal of the拐卖执法 is to locate and recover stolen children, protecting their physical safety and freedom.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
tgt: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
hypo: Secondly, there will be the judgment and punishment of the suspect.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
tgt: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
hypo: The meaning of criminal punishment, from individual punishments, social prevention, to legal education, can be listed many " big words ".

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
tgt: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
hypo: 但在解决绑架案件之前，应优先关注受害者的人身安全。

src: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
tgt: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.
hypo: matters, the purpose of the urgent " retrieval" of children, such as the issue of whether abduction should be treated with the death penalty, can temporarily be put aside for careful discussion; but the matter of救助 abducted children cannot be ignored.

src: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
tgt: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.
hypo: Based on the experience of investigating such cases, human traffickingrs have a tendency to quickly leave the location after capturing their prey.

src: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
tgt: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.
hypo: If the找回走失儿童 operation takes a moment longer, the child may be one step further away from its parents, and the difficulty of solving the case increases by one level.

src: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
tgt: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.
hypo: In this situation，拿出像"Unity" platform这样的直接有助于破案、找回孩子的有效办法， is indeed a practical行动.

src: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
tgt: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.
hypo: After all, "countering trafficking" requires the coordination of the entire legal system to achieve its goals effectively.

src: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
tgt: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.
