tgt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival.
hypo: The State Council Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism has recently issued an instructions notice on strengthening the epidemic prevention control of border towns and cities, requiring personnel who have recently left land border towns and cities (excluding those connected with Hong Kong and Macao) to obtain negative test results for核酸检测 within 48 hours, and for personnel returning to land border towns and cities, at least one test will be performed after arrival.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
tgt: According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022.
hypo: According to the notification, the time period referred to in the above requirements is from the date when each province, city, and town determine the port city scope and publish it, until March 15, 2022.

src: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
tgt: In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction.
hypo: In addition, the notice proposes that有条件的port cities can study the establishment of anti-COVID-19 buffer zones in their jurisdictions.

src: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
tgt: According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges.
hypo: According to the official of the National Health and Wellness Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Bureau, for some border towns, cross-border trade is the main local economic支柱， with frequent visits between the two sides by border residents.

src: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
tgt: The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost.
hypo: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。 Epidemic prevention, risk of epidemic, risk of epidemic prevention, epidemic prevention policy, regional differentiation, regional differentiation management, regional differentiation management, risk reduction, maximum effect on epidemic prevention and control.

src: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
tgt: Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities.
hypo: In recent times, there have been several local clusters of epidemics in China, each of which was imported from overseas through border city towns.

src: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
tgt: The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation.
hypo: The above-mentioned notice points out that this has exposed the following issues: the lack of timely疫情 monitoring and alerting in some places, the non-practical implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk positions, the regular DNA testing being performed in form, the inadequate cleaning and destruction of cold chain components, the non-practical management of集中隔离 facilities, and the insufficient scientific and precise handling of COVID-19 emergency responses.

src: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
tgt: The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases.
hypo: The circular requires focusing on nine aspects, including improving port cities' epidemic prevention and control mechanisms, maintaining an accurate epidemic monitoring and warning system, and implementing边境 control measures, to accelerate the filling of short-comings in port cities' epidemic prevention and control. We must not放松 our efforts in controlling the epidemic and work scientifically and准確ly to prevent imports. We will build up and strengthen the external border defense lines.

src: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
tgt: The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses.
hypo: The notice emphasizes that cities along the entry and exit points should conduct parallel research and deployment of COVID-19 prevention and control measures as well as basic life support work simultaneously. They should publish and maintain access to basic life support hotlines, regularly inspect potential issues in the supply and price of basic living materials, and promptly solve and respond to the most pressing problems reported by the public.

src: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
tgt: According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.
hypo: According to the notification, the cities mentioned refer to the county(city, district, flag), city(state, province, alliance) and capital city where borders are opened for land, water, air transportation. The specific scope is determined and公告ed by the各省(自治区、直辖市)in accordance with the epidemic prevention needs.

src: 油管视频起底美军20年嗜血杀戮真相-新华网
tgt: YouTube video uncovers the truth of US army’s bloodthirsty killing of 20 years - Xinhuanet
hypo: Video revealing the truth of the US army's 20 years of bloodthirsty杀戮 -新华网

src: （视频来源：油管）
tgt: (source of video: YouTube)
hypo: The English translation for "视频来源：油管" is "The video source is on YouTube."

src: 12月11日，油管平台一条名为《杀戮机器》的微纪录片引起广泛关注。
tgt: On December 11, a short documentary named Killing Machine went viral on YouTube.
hypo: On December 11th, a micro documentary titled " killing machine" went viral on the YouTube platform.

src: 该片讲述了美国以“反恐”为名发动阿富汗战争，通过战争强行输出美式民主，20年穷兵黩武、嗜血成性、滥杀无辜，犯下种种反人类罪行。
tgt: The documentary tells of various kinds of antihuman crimes committed by the US, including launching the war against Afghanistan in the name of “anti-terrorism”, outputting American democracy forcefully via wars, exhausting its resources to build up its military power, being obsessive about bloodthirsty killing, and massacring the innocent at will for 20 years.
hypo: This film tells of the US launching the War in Afghanistan under the name of "反恐，"强行 exporting American democracy through the war, becoming impulsive, bloodthirsty, and repeatedly killing innocent people for 20 years，犯下 numerous human- rights abuses.

src: 滥用无人机空袭医院、学校等民用场所，扭曲人性，成立杀人小组。
tgt: The US army launched air strikes to civil places such as hospitals and schools by abusing UAV, and established killing squad with distorting human nature.
hypo: The misuse of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) to attack civilian areas such as hospitals and schools扭曲s people's hearts, and establishes杀人 squad.

src: 20年来，美军杀害了数万阿富汗无辜平民。
tgt: The US army has killed dozens of thousands of innocent Afghanistan civilians for 20 years.
hypo: Over the past 20 years, the United States military has killed hundreds of thousands of innocent civilians in Afghanistan.

src: 美军设“黑狱”对“嫌犯”施加种种酷刑、人身羞辱。
tgt: The US army set up “black prison” to apply various cruel tortures and personal humiliation to “suspects”.
hypo: The US military has established "black cells" to apply various cruel tortures and human羞辱 to "嫌犯".

src: 一桩桩反人类罪行激起更多阿富汗人的仇恨。
tgt: Countless antihuman crimes stirred up hatred from even more Afghan civilians.
hypo: A series of anti- Humanity crimes stir up more hatred among the阿富汗 people.

src: 正如视频所说，美式“反恐”战争“越反越恐 ” 。
tgt: Just as what the video says, American anti-terrorism war “is creating more terrorism”.
hypo: As the video mentioned, the American "反恐" war is "from counter-attack to terror."

src: 战争没有给阿富汗人民带去和平民主、繁荣希望，带去的只有满目疮痍的国家和无数的杀戮破坏。
tgt: The war did not bring peacefulness, democracy, prosperity or hope to Afghan people; instead, they threw the country in a state of devastation and countless killing and destruction.
hypo: The war did not bring peace, democracy, and prosperity to the people of阿富汗. Instead, it brought only a shattered country and countless killings and destruction.

src: 戳视频，让我们一起来揭穿美国以“反恐”为名，嗜血杀戮的真相，戳穿美式民主的虚伪假面！
tgt: Let us click on the video and reveal the truth of bloodthirsty killing in the name of “anti-terrorism” of the US, and rip off the false mask of American democracy!
hypo: Click the video and together let's uncover the truth about the American government's love of bloodthirsty killing under the pretext of "反恐" and揭露the虚伪Mask of American democracy!

src: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
tgt: Don’t scare people off at the starting line - Xinhuanet
hypo: Don't scare people into early finish line -新华网

src: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
tgt: We can usually feel the popularity of books on success when we go to bookstores.
hypo: When you go to bookstores, you often can feel the熱烈的經濟學類書籍 market.

src: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
tgt: Many books on success nowadays advocate the “best principle”, which first assumes or implies that you can “do it”, and then tell you “what it is” that you need to do.
hypo: Many success-oriented books today promote the "Best Practice principle" - which involves assuming or hints at what one can achieve, followed by revealing what needs to be done.

src: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
tgt: It skips the most important and fundamental link of “how to do it”.
hypo: It means that you have skipped the most important and fundamental link in the process of achieving something.

src: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
tgt: As such, these books have one common characteristic; you either work to be the best or do nothing at all; you either be 100 or be 0; you either climb on Mount Tai or stay where you are.
hypo: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。

src: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
tgt: The “best principle” will make every reader believe it is “absolutely right”, but 99% of people will be scared off at the starting line.
hypo: This "best principle" will be recognized by everyone as "绝对正确，" but 99% of people will be intimidated by it before they start the race.

src: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
tgt: Because this theory advocates a route in which “you have to be resolute to start again and change 180 degrees”, and this happens to be the weakest point of many people.
hypo: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。  This theory promotes a path of "making a tough decision, reborn, and transforming completely for a 180-degree turn," which is exactly what many people lack.

src: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
tgt: Shouting “you need to change” to people who stick to the rules, follow the old ways, and refuse to change is lying to yourself and casting pearls before swine.
hypo: For someone who refuse to change, follow the rules, and refuse to adapt, you choose to shout "You need to change" in their ear, which is undoubtedly a case of delusion and speaking to the horse's ear.

src: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
tgt: The majority of people will be timid in front of “change”, reluctant to move forward or make the decision; or, they have made the decision to “change” on an impulse and bravely taken the first step, but it doesn’t last long and they will lose courage after persevering for while; they cannot be persistent.
hypo: Most people will feel intimidated by the word "转变" and hesitate, making difficult decisions; or they may make a strong decision based on a sudden冲动， but it is often short-lived and they lose the battle before they can keep it up for a long time. It is difficult to see sustainability in this.

src: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
tgt: From Tomorrow On, the famous sketch from Mr. Ma Sanli, most vividly depicts the classic of “common humanity”.
hypo: Mr. Ma's famous sketch from " Tomorrow On" is the classic that最生动地 embody this "common humanity."

src: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
tgt: The biggest problem of the “best principle” is the threshold is too high; it surpasses the limit of the ability of ordinary people and leave most people “sigh at the beginning”.
hypo: The biggest problem with the "best principle" is that the threshold is too high, often exceeding the capabilities of the average person and leaving most people "curious but unable" to follow it.

src: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
tgt: Or, the “second best principle” perhaps is a route for more ordinary people to be successful.
hypo: Perhaps, the "次好原则" is the only way to potentially put more ordinary people on a relatively successful path.

src: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
tgt: The core of the “second best principle” is lowering the threshold; it encourages “accumulating small successes to have big success”; even if you cannot reach 100, you can be 1, because 1 is always bigger than 0; if you cannot climb on Mount Tai, you can climb on the small dune in front of your house, because that is still better than marching on the spot.
hypo: The core of the "次好原则" is " lowered threshold" - it encourages the theory of " gathering small victories to achieve great achievements", that is, if you cannot reach 100, just 1 is fine: because 1 always greater than 0. If you cannot climb to the泰山， just climb to the small sand hill at your door's edge is also fine, because it is better than staying where you are.

src: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
tgt: Anyway, doing anything is better than doing nothing at all.
hypo: In any case, doing anything is better than not doing anything.

src: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
tgt: Due to the dramatic lowering of the threshold, the possibility of ordinary people persevering with it is higher; the success rate will be higher for anything as long as you persevere,
hypo: Due to the significant reduction in barriers, there is a higher likelihood for ordinary people to persevere. As long as you persevere, the probability of success will also increase.

src: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
tgt: It’s just that the journey will be longer if you follow the “second best principle”.
hypo: The path to success following the "次好原则" is just a bit longer than the others.

src: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
tgt: In all, although the “best principle” on the surface claims to make everyone successful, it will eventually only encourage few people in actuality; the “second best principle” can effectively encourage more people and make more people actually gain benefit.
hypo: In conclusion, while the "best principle" may claim to promote success for all, it ultimately serves only a few; the "次好 principle" can effectively encourage a wider audience and to the greatest extent possible, benefit everyone.

src: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
tgt: The reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in the Qinghai Lake have increased by 7.1 thousand tons - Xinhuanet
hypo: The amount of wild鲤 resources in the Great Lake Yangtze has increased by 710,000 tons this year, according to a news article from Xinhuanet.

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
tgt: Report from Xinhua News Agency Xining on December 11 (Reporters Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters learned from the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province that the latest monitoring results showed that the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources increased by 7,100 tons this year compared with the previous year, reaching 108,500 tons; there is a cumulative increase of more than 40 times compared with that in the initial stage of protection in 2002.
hypo: According to information from the Ministry of Industry and农业 in青海省 on December 11, 2023 (记者骆晓飞、张宏祥), the latest monitoring results show that theuntoldfish resources in the Great Lake have increased by 710,000 tons this year compared to the previous year, reaching 10,850,000 tons. This is a 40-fold increase compared to the early days of conservation in 2002.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
tgt: Gymnocypris przewalskii, commonly known as “scaleless carp”, is a unique and precious fish species in the Qinghai Lake, which plays an indispensable role in maintaining the safety and biodiversity of the “water, fish, bird” ecological chain in Qinghai Lake Basin.
hypo: The common name of the s没有人知道 s "湟鱼" is in the Qinghai-Tibet National Park, and it is a unique and precious fish species in the park. It plays a crucial role in maintaining the chain of "fish, bird, and water" in the park's ecosystem, and also contributes to the safety and biodiversity.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, the number of gymnocypris przewalskii has decreased sharply due to the human hunting in vast quantities and the increasingly degraded environment of breeding waters of gymnocypris przewalskii, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in Qinghai Lake in 2002 were only 2,592 tons.
hypo: In the early 1960s and late 1970s, due to humanely large-scale fishing, the environment of the breeding water of the gymnocypris przewalskii was gradually degradation, leading to a significant decline in the number of gymnocypris przewalskii. In 2002, the total resource stock of gymnocypris przewalskii in the青海湖 was only 2,592 tons.

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
tgt: In 2004, gymnocypris przewalskii was listed as an endangered species in the Red List of Chinese Species.
hypo: In 2004, theGymnocypris przewalskii (L感魚) was listed as an Endangered species in the Chinese Species红色名录.

src: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
tgt: From 2003, Qinghai province implemented the closure of lakes for fish breeding, prohibited any unit, collective or individual from fishing gymnocypris przewalskii in the main rivers and tributaries in the lake area, and prohibited the sale of gymnocypris przewalskii and their products.
hypo: Since 2003, the State Council of China has implemented water control and fish cultivation, and has prohibited any unit, collective, or individual from fishing raw fish in the Lake Tanganyika and the main rivers and branches of the lake. Raw fish and its products are strictly prohibited from sale.

src: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
tgt: In the meantime, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources have increased year by year through artificial breeding and releasing, clearing of the main rivers flowing into Qinghai Lake and river courses, designing scientific and reasonable “fish passage” and other measures to continue to strengthen protection.
hypo: At the same time, through measures such as artificial proliferation and release, clearing of the main river channels entering青海湖， and designing科学合理 "passage ways" for fish to move through, the reservoir of przewalskii fish resources in the青海湖 has been gradually increasing year by year.

src: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
tgt: Yang Lin, Deputy Director General of Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, introduced that up until now, nearly 180 million gymnocypris przewalskii have been artificially reproduced and released, contributing more than 23% to the recovery of gymnocypris przewalskii resources.
hypo: Yanglin, Secretary-General of the qinghai government's Department of Farmers' Market and Housing, reported that to date, the Qinghai Lake whitefish have been implemented in total of nearly 180 million尾 through artificial proliferation and release, contributing超过23% to the restoration of the Qinghai Lake whitefish resources.

src: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
tgt: Qinghai three-rivers area is an important ecological barrier and water conservation area in China and even Asia, and Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area to control the eastward spread of desertification in the west.
hypo: The Three rivers' area in Qinghai is an important ecological barrier and water source preservation area for China and even Asia.青海湖 is a natural barrier and ecological function area controlling the spread of desertification in the western part of China.

src: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。
tgt: In order to protect the ecological environment of the three rivers area and the waters of Qinghai Lake, protect aquatic wildlife, and maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, Qinghai has issued a notice banning fishing in the key waters of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake since this year, and established a comprehensive management system of fishing ban of “one river, one river, and one lake”.
hypo: In order to protect the ecological environment and aquatic wildlife of the Three rivers area and Qinghai Lake, as well as to maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, from this year ago, Qinghai has issuedCirculars of No hunting in key waters of the Yangtze, Yellow and Qinghai rivers, and Qinghai Lake，构建起“One river, one lake” comprehensive no-hunting management system.

src: 第十三届省茶博会开幕 - 视点头条 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
tgt: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo opened - Headline of viewpoints - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
hypo: The第十四届湖南省茶博会 has opened - Top news on view - 湖南日报网 - Huasheng Online

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 张尚武 胡盼盼 通讯员 刘晓玲 摄影 李健）今天上午，第十三届湖南茶业博览会暨新化红茶推介会在湖南国际会展中心举行，展示茶产业，创新茶科技，弘扬茶文化，加快冲刺千亿茶产业目标。
tgt: Message from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalists: Zhang Shangwu and Hu Panpan, correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, photographer: Li Jian) The 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and Xinhua Black Tea Introduction and Marketing Event were held in Hunan International Expo Center this morning to exhibit tea industry, innovate tea science and technology, advocate tea culture and accelerate the process of realizing the industry objective of 100 billion.
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is:  "2023年12月10日，湖南日报 (Huo Po武， Zhang尚武， Liu Xiaoling, Li Qing) - The 13th Hunan Tea Industry Fair and New China化 Tea Product Promotion Conference were held in Hunan International Trade Center this morning, showcasing the tea industry, innovating tea technology, promoting tea culture, and accelerating the pursuit of the 100 billion-dollar tea industry goal."

src: 中华全国供销合作总社理事会副主任侯顺利、省人大常委会副主任叶红专出席开幕式。
tgt: Hou Shunli, deputy director of the Council of China National Supply and Marketing Cooperative Head Office, and Ye Hongzhuan, deputy director of the Standing Committee of Provincial People’s Congress, attended the opening ceremony.
hypo: His Excellency Hong Xiuqin, Director of the National Association of Social Work and Construction Employees'理事会， and Director Yinghong专， of the State Committee of the National Congress of the Communist Party of China, attended the opening ceremony.

src: 中国工程院院士刘仲华教授在开幕式上隆重推介：湖红之源在新化，红茶崛起为“五彩湘茶”注入新动力。
tgt: Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: Xinhua is the source of Hunan Black Tea, and the emerging of the black tea injects new energy into the “colorful Hunan tea”.
hypo: The Chinese Academy of Engineering's Dr. Liu Zhong Hua promoted the importance of the origin of the湖红 in New化， where the red tea's rise to become the " colorful Hunan tea" added a new force.

src: 近年来，省委、省政府大力支持茶产业发展，推进千亿湘茶产业建设，形成“三湘四水五彩茶”的发展格局。
tgt: In recent years, the provincial Party committee and the provincial government have vigorously supported the development of the tea industry, promoted the construction of the Hunan tea industry of 100 billion and formed the development pattern of “three Xiang, four rivers, and five colors of tea”.
hypo: In recent years, theprovincial government has heavily supported the development of the tea industry, actively promoting the construction of a 100 billion Chinese tea industry, and creating a development pattern of "三湘四水，多彩茶".

src: 省内茶界加大创新，绿茶、黑茶、红茶等主力茶类轮番发力，主产茶区推进茶旅融合，带动广大茶农增收。
tgt: The tea industry of the province has been promoting innovation, and main tea types such as green tea and black tea take turns to generate power; tea-travel integration is promoted in main tea production areas to drive income increase of tea farmers.
hypo: The domestic tea industry is increasing in innovation, with主角茶类 such as green tea, black tea, and red tea轮流发力. The main tea-producing regions are promoting tea tourism integration, which is带动广大茶农增收.

src: 风水轮流转，红茶又发力。
tgt: Every type of tea takes turns to gain its spotlight, and now it is time for black tea.
hypo: The风水轮流转， tea again takes off.

src: 省内茶界专家称，采完绿茶采红茶、黑茶，茶农一年四季有收入，茶园产值直线上升。
tgt: According to opinion of experts in the tea industry in the province, tea farmers pick black tea after green tea and have income in all four seasons, making the  production value of tea gardens soar.
hypo: According to experts in the domestic tea industry, after cultivating green tea, tea farmers can also produce black and brown tea. This leads to an increase in the yield of tea gardens throughout the year.

src: 在开幕式上，省领导为第四批获权使用“湖南红茶”商标的企业进行授牌，新化喜捧“湖红之源 ” 。
tgt: At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded plates to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark of “Hunan black tea”, and Xinhua was awarded the title of “source of Hunan black tea”.
hypo: At the opening ceremony, the department leaders授牌 to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark " 湖南红茶", and Xinhuai enjoy the " Lake Red Spark".

src: 在新化红茶展馆，福建茶商看中一款名为“冰里春”的高山茶，当即下订单。
tgt: In the exhibition hall of Xinhua black tea, a tea merchant from Fujian took a fancy to a high mountain tea named “spring in ice” and placed an order immediately.
hypo: At the New Fusion Chinese tea exhibition space, an福建 tea merchant discovered a high-quality tea named "Ice Cloud Spring" and immediately made a purchase.

src: 省茶业协会秘书长王准高兴地说，当前疫情等因素或多或少影响茶叶市场，但从茶博会现场看，亮点纷呈。
tgt: Wang Zhun, secretary-general of provincial tea association, said happily that factors such as epidemic exert an impact on the tea market to a certain extent; however, based on the situations at the tea expo, there are various highlights.
hypo: The Secretary-General of the State-owned Tea Industry Association, Wang Qi, was delighted to say that various factors, to varying degrees, are affecting the tea market currently. However, from the perspective of the tea show现场， there are many highlights to be seen.

src: 新化红茶一抹红，注入了茶文化内涵，人气旺、交易火，湘茶产业喜迎新的春天。
tgt: The red color of Xinhua black tea has instilled the essence of tea culture, and with its popularity and hot transactions, the Hunan tea industry is ushering in a new spring.
hypo: A bright red sample of new Chinese black tea has injected cultural connotations into the tea industry, and there are high levels of popularity and hot transactions. The Chinese tea industry is迎接 a new spring.

src: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
tgt: Exhibition planners of China and Saudi Arabia work together to hold the first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia - Xinhuanet
hypo: The first contemporary art双年展 in Saudi Arabia was jointly hosted by the exhibition planners from China and Saudi Arabia -新华网

src: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Riyadh on December 12 (journalists: Wang Haizhou and Hu Guan): The first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia, Diriyah contemporary art biennale, was officially opened to the public in the JAX arts district of Diriyah in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, on December 11, and a total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and other countries and regions participated in the exhibition.
hypo: 新华社利雅得12月12日电(记者王海洲 胡冠)：沙特阿拉伯的首届当代艺术双年展——迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特阿拉伯首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有64位艺术家参加了展览。

src: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
tgt: The biennale is planned jointly by Diriyah biennale foundation of Saudi Arabia and UCCA of China, and Tian Feiyu, curator of UCCA of China, works as the art director.
hypo: This year's Biennial is jointly策展 by the沙特 Diriyah Biennial Foundation and the United Chinese contemporary art center. The Director of Art is UCCA of China, TianFEi Yin.

src: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
tgt: According to the introduction from the planning team, the theme of the biennale is “crossing the river by feeling the stones”, which is a metaphor of the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transition period and reflects the current situations of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia.
hypo: According to the策展 team, the theme of this biennale is "摸着石头过河." This metaphor represents the reform strategies implemented during the period of social economic transformation and also reflects the current situation of development in Saudi society and culture.

src: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
tgt: The biennale occupies an area of nearly twelve thousand square meters, and the exhibition hall stretches across six connected buildings with six units: Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones, Inheritance as an Experiment, Thinking at the Edge, Walking to the Public, Beautiful New Word and On the Spirit of Arts.
hypo: This Biennium Exhibition occupy an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with the exhibition space spanning six interconnected buildings. The exhibition space is presented in six sections: "摸着石头过河" "的传承 as experiment" "的边缘思考" "走向公众" "的美丽新世界" and "论艺术的精神".

src: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
tgt: In which the number of the works of the 27 artists from Saudi Arabia accounts for more than 40% of the total number of the exhibits, including various art forms such as drawing, installation art and performing art; the works of the 12 Chinese artists also attracted much attention, and some artists create with recycled materials in an innovative way; for example, Xu Bing reconstructed a classic landscape painting with wastes in Behind the Story Series, Picture of Endless Streams and Mountains (2014).
hypo: Among these 27沙特阿拉伯 artists, the number of works includes various forms such as painting, installation art, and performance art. The works of 12 Chinese artists are also of great attention. Some artists use recycled materials in innovative ways, for example, Xu Bing重构了一幅经典山水画，in "Endless Streams" (2014), which uses waste materials to reconstruct a classic Chinese landscape painting.

src: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
tgt: According to Buckley, CEO of Diriyah biennale foundation, it is hoped that the biennale can establish an international dialogue, provide global audiences with opportunities to understand the vigorously developed culture industry and innovative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen interactions.
hypo: The首席执行官 of the diry耶 Biennial Foundation，巴克利， hopes that this届 Biennial can establish international dialogue, allowing global audiences to have the opportunity to learn about the thriving cultural industry in沙特阿拉伯 and engage in further interaction and exchange.

src: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
tgt: Tian Feiyu said, “The biennale has two objectives, i.e., establishing dialogue between contemporary art of Saudi Arabia and the world, and integrating audiences of Saudi Arabia into the contemporary art world.”
hypo: Tony He said: "The goal of the biennial is双重， it can involve the participation of contemporary art in global dialogue and also integrate沙特 audience into the world of contemporary art. "

src: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
tgt: It is understood that there will be a series of lectures during the biennale, and artists, exhibition planners and leaders of innovative industries will engage in discussions on cross-cultural communication, contemporary art development and other topics.
hypo: According to some information, a series of lectures will be held during the opening week of the biennial event. Leaders in the field of innovative industries, artists, and策展人 will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange, the development of contemporary art.

src: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
tgt: Yunnan: Coordinate and standardize management of rural public welfare posts - Xinhuanet
hypo: Yunnan: harmony and regulation of rural basic-grade employment management through Xinhuanet

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Kunming on December 12 (journalist: Lin Bifeng): In order to continue to provide assistance to the employment of people lifted out of poverty, consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation work, Yunnan Province has released policies on the management of public welfare position in villages for promoting rural revitalization, as a way to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.
hypo: 新华社昆明12月12日电 (记者林碧锋)为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台了相关政策，以促进乡村公益性岗位管理，助力全面推进乡村振兴。

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
tgt: As introduced by person-in-charge of Department of Human Resources and Social Security of Yunnan, a total of 448.3 thousand rural public welfare positions have been developed in Yunnan to solve the employment of rural groups with difficulties such as labor force lifted out of poverty; they play an important role in helping people lifted out of poverty obtain employment and increase income, consolidating achievements of poverty relief and effectively improving rural public service abilities.
hypo: According to the person-in-charge of the State Council's economic development department in在云南， currently, a total of 44,830 public-use jobs have been developed in rural areas to accommodate relief work and other rural困难群体 employment, playing an important role in helping the relief people achieve employment and income growth, strengthening the achievements of rural public services and effectively improving the ability of rural areas to provide essential public services.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
tgt: The new regulation is jointly printed and issued by seven departments such as the Department of Human Resources and Social Security, Rural Revitalization and Department of Finance of Yunnan, which mainly provides unified regulations on object scope, fund management, post development and post management of applicants of rural public welfare positions.
hypo: This new regulation is issued by seven departments, including the云南人社， rural development, and finance, jointly. It mainly standardizes aspects such as the scope of recruitment of rural公益性岗位 personnel，资金管理， job development, and job management at the基层 level.

src: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
tgt: In terms of position development and setting, it is clearly stipulated in the new regulation that the positions are set according to the principles of “setting positions according to demands, designating personnel according to positions, dynamic management and total quantity control”, “the unit that develops and utilizes the positions shall be responsible for them” and “one position with one person, voluntariness, publicity and unified management”
hypo: In the field of job development and establishment, the new policy explicitly specifies that the establishment is conducted according to the "timely allocation of positions, fixed personnel, dynamic management, and total control of resource" principle, "Who develops, who uses, and who is responsible," and "One person-one position, voluntary public disclosure, and unified management."

src: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
tgt: The recruitment procedures must be conducted in accordance the steps of announcement, application, review, making public notice, employment, pre-job training and taking up the post.
hypo: The recruitment process must follow steps such as announcements, reports, review，公示， hire, pre-job training, and scheduling for employment.

src: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
tgt: In addition, the new regulation also specifies the specific duties of the main development department as well as the subsidy standard and method of the rural public welfare positions; it is stipulated that the development departments of rural public welfare positions shall purchase accidental injury commercial insurance for people taking rural public welfare positions; responsible departments are required to regularly supervise the subsidy distribution of rural public welfare positions.
hypo: In addition, the new regulation also clarifies the specific responsibilities of the main development departments for rural public-supported agriculture jobs, the application standards and supplementing methods for rural public-supported agriculture jobs. It规定各 rural public-supported agriculture job development departments should purchase professional意外伤害商业保险 for the personnel安置 in rural public-supported agriculture jobs; and并要求有关部门定期对 rural public-supported agriculture job supplementing payment situation进行监督.

src: 毛里求斯等国首次发现奥密克戎毒株感染病例-新华网
tgt: Omicron strain infection cases were found in Mauritius and other countries for the first time - Xinhuanet
hypo: 新华网快讯：中国、印度、巴西、毛里求斯等国首次发现Omicron毒株感染病例。

src: 新华社北京12月12日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：毛里求斯、塞浦路斯和马拉维近日首次报告发现新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 12, reported by foreign corespondent of comprehensive Xinhua News Agency: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi recently reported to have found the infection cases of Omicron strains, the new COVID-19 variant, for the first time.
hypo: According to reports from驻外 journalists of新华社， Malawi, Cyprus, and Malawi recently reported the first cases of COVID-变异病毒 Omicron variant infection.

src: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Mauritius reported two infection cases of Omicron strains on December 10 for the first time.
hypo: Mauritania reported its first two cases of Omicron variant infection on the 10th day.

src: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
tgt: According to introduction from Kelesh Jagutpal, Minister of Ministry of Health of Mauritius, one of the infected people was a tourist departing from South Africa and arriving in Mauritius on November 27; the other infected person was a local resident of Mauritius, who was tested positive in nucleic acid test on November 30 after contacting a person who returned from South Africa.
hypo: According to the Minister of Health of Mauritius，凯莱什·贾古特帕尔， one of the感染者 arrived in Mauritius from South Africa on November 27th, and the other from Mauritius, a local resident, passed a positive test result after being contacts with an individual who recently returned from South Africa.

src: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
tgt: The nucleic acid test results of the two infected people changed to negative after quarantine and receiving treatment in the hospital, and now they have returned to their own respective residence.
hypo: After receiving treatment in a hospital, the核酸检测 results of the two infected individuals have all been turned negative, and they have now returned to their respective homes.

src: 塞浦路斯卫生部10日宣布该国首次确诊3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: It was announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that the country confirmed three cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
hypo: The塞浦路斯 Ministry of Health announced on Monday that it had today首次 diagnosed three cases of the Omicron variant of COVID-19 in the country.

src: 这3人都是学生，本月初从国外旅行回来，由于均为轻症，并未入院治疗。
tgt: All of the 3 infected people were students who came back after traveling in other countries at the beginning of this month; all of them were not hospitalized because they were mild cases.
hypo: These three students were all students and returned from abroad earlier this month. All of them had轻症 and did not require hospitalization for treatment.

src: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
tgt: In order to prevent the spreading of the Omicron strains, the government of Cyprus kept strengthening the prevention and control.
hypo: In order to prevent the spread of the Omicron strain, the government of the country has been enhancing its prevention efforts.

src: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
tgt: All the passengers above 12 years old who enter the country by plane shall take nucleic acid test at their own expenses at the airport from December 6 to January 10 next year.
hypo: From December 6th to January 10th, any traveler who enters the country by air aged 12 or above will need to pay for核酸检测 at the airport upon arrival.

src: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
tgt: It was also announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that they would start inoculate children from 5 to 11 years old in the country with Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
hypo: On October 10th, the Ministry of Health of Spain announced that it would begin接种Pfizer COVID-19疫苗 in children aged 5 to 11 in the country.

src: 马拉维卫生部长昆比泽·奇蓬达9日说，该国首次发现3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Kunbizze Chiponda, Minister of Ministry of Health of Malawi, said on December 9 that Malawi found 3 cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
hypo: On September 9th, Malawi's Ministry of Health official, Clifton Chibaka, announced the country's first three cases of Omicronmicron infection.

src: 该国卫生部门对从11月9日至12月2日采集的12个新冠阳性样本开展基因组测序，发现了这3例感染病例。
tgt: The Department of Health of Malawi conducted genomic sequencing for 12 COVID-19 positive samples collected from November 9 to December 2 and found the 3 cases of infection.
hypo: The Department of Health of the country conducted genomic sequencing on 12 positive COVID-19 samples collected from November 9th to December 2nd, and found three infected cases.

src: 星空有约丨双子座流星雨14日迎来极大-新华网
tgt: Rendezvous with the starry sky | Geminid meteor shower will usher in the maximum scale on December 14 - Xinhuanet
hypo: The Starry Encounter: Thegemini流星雨 to Launch on April 14th - Xinhuanet

src: 新华社天津12月12日电（记者周润健）天文科普专家介绍，作为本年度最后一场大规模流星雨，北半球三大流星雨之一的双子座流星雨将在12月14日迎来极大，喜欢流星雨的朋友可在当日后半夜进行观测。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Tianjin on December 12 (journalist: Zhou Runjian) According to introduction from astronomy science popularization expert, as the final large-scale meteor shower this year, the geminid meteor shower as one of the three major meteor showers in the Northern Hemisphere will be the maximum on December 14, and people who like meteor showers can observe during the latter half of the night on that day.
hypo: According to a source in the新华社 news service, Beijing, the first paragraph of the sentence is:  "天文科普专家告诉记者，作为本年度最后一场大规模流星雨，双子座流星雨将于12月14日迎来极大，喜欢流星雨的朋友可在当日后半夜进行观测。"  The English translation is:  "的专家告诉记者，作为本年度最后一场大规模流星雨，双子座流星雨将于12月14日迎来极大。喜欢流星雨的朋友可在当日后半夜进行观测。"

src: 北京市天文爱好者安久2018年12月13日在青海拍摄的双子座流星雨。
tgt: Photo of geminid meteor shower shot on December 13, 2018 in Qinghai by An Jiu, a lover of astronomy from Beijing.
hypo: The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, and astronomy.

src: 大部分流星雨的母天体都是周期彗星，但双子座流星雨的母天体却是3200号小行星法厄同，这是一颗阿波罗型小行星。
tgt: The parent object of most of the meteor showers are periodic comets; however, the parent object of the geminid meteor showers is Phaethon, No. 3200 asteroid, which is also an Apollo type asteroid.
hypo: Most流星雨 parent objects are周期彗星， but the parent object of the双子座流星雨 is小行星 3200 Fizei, which is a阿波罗-type小行星.

src: 双子座流星雨也是目前已知第二个不是由彗星“孕育”的流星雨。
tgt: The geminid meteor shower is the second known meteor shower that is not “bred” by comets so far.
hypo: The双子座流星雨 is also the second known流星雨 not " nurtured" by彗星.

src: 天津市天文学会理事、天文科普专家修立鹏介绍说，就如贺岁大片一样，双子座流星雨一般在岁末出现 ， “ 上映档期”可以从12月4日持续到17日。
tgt: According to introduction from Xiu Lipeng, a member of the Council of Tianjin Astronomy Society and an expert of astronomical science popularization, just like a new year blockbuster, geminid meteor shower generally occurs at the end of a year, with the “screening time” lasting from December 4 to December 17.
hypo: Lipeng said that, just like贺岁大片， the Double Five流星雨 typically appears at the end of the year, and the "上映日期" can range from December 4th to 17th.

src: 该流星雨以流量大且稳定著称，与象限仪流星雨、英仙座流星雨一起被称为北半球三大流星雨。
tgt: The geminid meteor shower is known for its ample flow and stabilization, which is called together with the Quadrantal meteor shower and the Perseids meteor shower as the three major meteor showers of the Northern Hemisphere.
hypo: This流星雨 is known for its high流量 and stability, and is together with the 流星雨 of the象限仪座 and the 仙后座 class of three major流星雨 in the northern hemisphere.

src: 双子座流星雨的一个显著特点是流星体速度较慢，色彩丰富，火流星也不少，既适合目视，也适合天文摄影的初学者进行拍摄。
tgt: A significant characteristic of the geminid meteor shower is the slow speed of the meteoroid, the abundant colors and the large number of fireballs, which is suitable for both visual observation and shooting by beginners of astronomical photography.
hypo: One显著 feature of the双子座流星雨 is its slow speed, rich colors, and numerous fireballs. It is suitable for both experienced目测 photographers and beginners learning about天文 photography.

src: 天津市天文爱好者杨婧2020年12月13日在天津蓟州拍摄的双子座流星雨。
tgt: This is the photo of geminid meteor shower shot on December 13, 2020 in Qinghai by Yang Jing, a lover of astronomy from Tianjin.
hypo: Yang Jing, a在天津的天文爱好者， captured双子座流星雨 on December 13, 2020 in蓟州.

src: 天文预报显示，今年的双子座流星雨将于12月14日15时左右迎来极大，极大时ZHR（在理想观测条件下，辐射点位于头顶正上方时，每小时能看到的流星数量）为150。
tgt: Based on astronomical forecast, the geminid meteor shower this year will be reach its maximum scale at about 15:00 on December 14, and the ZHR at the maximum (in the ideal observation conditions, when the radiation point is right above the head, and the number of the meteors that can be seen every hour) is 150.
hypo: The astronomical forecast indicates that the双子座流星雨 of this year will experience its maximum scale around 15:00 on December 14th. The maximumZHR (the number of流星 seen per hour under ideal观测 conditions where the流星雨流星雨point is above the head) will be 150.

src: 双子座流星雨推荐指数图。
tgt: Chart of index of recommendation level of the geminid meteor shower.
hypo: The recommended指数 chart of the双子座流星雨.

src: “去年 ， ‘ 落英缤纷’的双子座流星雨给人们留下了深刻印象，但今年的双子座流星雨会受到月光干扰，精彩程度会打一点折扣。
tgt: “Last year, people were impressed by the geminid meteor shower; however, the geminid meteor shower this year will be influenced by moon light, and its brilliance will be slightly influenced.
hypo: Last year, the双子座流星雨 with its colorful fall of meteors left a deep impression on people. However, this year's双子座流星雨 will be affected by moonlight, and the excitement will be reduced.

src: 14日为农历十一月十一，月相为盈凸月，明亮的月光会对观测造成干扰，好在后半夜月亮就会落下，此时双子座流星雨的辐射点也会升得比较高。
tgt: December 14 is November 11 in Chinese calendar, with the moon in the gibbous phase; the bright moonlight will interfere with the observation; fortunately, the moon will go down in the latter half of the night, and the radiation point of the geminid meteor shower will rise higher.
hypo: The date is November 11th, under the lunar calendar, and the moon's phase is full and waxing. The bright moonlight will interfere with observation, but Fortunately, the moon will fall in the late半夜， and the radiation point of the双子座流星雨 will also rise higher at this time.

src: 喜欢流星雨的朋友可在后半夜月落后的这几个小时进行观测，但要注意防寒保暖 。 ”
tgt: People who like meteor showers can observe it in the hours after moon goes down in the latter half of the night, but remember to stay warm.”
hypo: If you are a friend who enjoys meteor showers, you can观测 them for the few hours after the moon sets. However, it's important to be prepared for防寒保暖.

src: 如何才能尽可能地观测到更多的流星呢？
tgt: How to observe as many meteors as possible?
hypo: How can one maximize the number of 流星 observations?

src: “不建议在城市进行观测，可以在郊区或是乡村选择一个海拔高、光害小、面向东北方向的视野开阔之处，然后耐心地等到月亮落下后，目视观测即可。
tgt: “It is not advised to observe meteor showers in the city; you may choose a place facing northeast and has high altitude, a wide view and little light pollution, and then you may observe with your eyes after the moon goes down.
hypo: It is not recommended to observe in a city. You can choose a place in the outskirts or countryside with high altitude, little light pollution, and an open view to the north.耐心地等月亮落下后，可以进行目测观测。

src: 需要注意的是，双子座流星雨朝各个方向的流量都很大，观测时不用一直盯着双子座流星雨的辐射点看。
tgt: It should be noted that the geminid meteor shower will have heavy flows on all directions, and you do not need to keep staring the radiation point of the geminid meteor shower.
hypo: It's worth noting that the meteor shower of the双子座 is very large in all directions, so you don't need to keep staring at the radiation point of the双子座流星雨.

src: 喜欢摄影的朋友要想拍摄出绚丽的‘流星雨大片 ’ ， 最好选择广角、大光圈的镜头，拍摄时使用高ISO和最大光圈。
tgt: People who like photography can select wide angle lens and large aperture, and use high ISO and the maximum aperture while shooting if you want to take marvelous shots of the meteor shower.
hypo: If friends who enjoy photography want to capture stunning "流星雨大片" shots, it's generally the best choice to use a wide-angle lens with a large aperture, and set the ISO to high during the shooting process.

src: 基于稳定性和持续性考虑，三脚架、备用电池和快门线也必不可少 。 ”
tgt: Based on consideration of stability and sustainability, a tripod, a standby battery and a shutter release are also necessary.”
hypo: Considering the stability and continuity, a tripod, spare battery, and shutter release are also necessary.

src: 修立鹏提醒说。
tgt: Xiu Lipeng reminded.
hypo: Xiu Li朋 reminded him.

src: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
tgt: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website – Fan Mingzheng, the Prime Minister of the Vietnam Government, attended the third Vietnam National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum
hypo: 越南人民报网 -越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛  越南 National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum is being attended by Prime Minister NgOan test during the third iteration of the country's national digital technology enterprise development forum.

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
tgt: Two main conferences were held during the third Vietnam National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum, and discussions were held with two main topics, digital technology enterprises and national digital transformation, and digital technology enterprises and economic recovery and development during and after the epidemic.
hypo: Two main meetings were held during the Third越南 National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum, with topics covering both the technology enterprise and digital transformation of the country, as well as the technology enterprise and the COVID-19 pandemic and post-pandemic economic recovery and development.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
tgt: According to Ruan Mengxiong, Minister of Communication and Media Department, in 2021, despite the continuous spreading of the epidemic, the quantity and operation revenue of Vietnamese digital technology enterprises kept increasing, with an increase rate of nearly 10%.
hypo: According to Ruan Mengxiong, the Minister of Communications and Media, in 2021, despite the ongoing spread of the COVID-19 pandemic, the number of越南 digital technology enterprises and their annual revenues continue to grow, reaching nearly 10%.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
tgt: In 2021, the quantity of typical digital products of Vietnam solved various major difficulties Vietnam was facing; many digital products have walked out of the country, and the ranking of the digital technology in Vietnam has climbed up.
hypo: In 2021，越南 focused on cultivating a large number of典型 digital products to address the major challenges it faced. Many digital products have been exported to other countries, and the ranking of越南 in digital technology has improved.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
tgt: Minister Ruan Mengxiong appealed to digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility as a platform to develop national digital transformation; undertaking the task of developing these national digital platforms is undertaking the mission of the country.
hypo: The Minister Ngomeng Ngomeng called upon digital technology companies to assume the responsibility of developing national digital transformation platforms. 承担起发展这些国家数字平台的任务，就是承担起国家使命。

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
tgt: At the forum, leaders from various departments and government agencies as well as the enterprises, organizations and individuals engaged in research, development, application and transfer of digital technologies shared experience and advocated to pool resources from the whole society to develop technology enterprises in Vietnam, work together to promote digital transformation of the country, and seek breakthrough plans and solutions for economic recovery after the epidemic.
hypo: At the forum, leaders from various sectors and national government agencies, including enterprises, organizations, and individuals actively researching, developing, applying, and transferring digital technology, shared innovative ideas and solutions to动员 and汇集 the whole community's resources to develop越南's technology enterprises, promote the country's digital transformation, and support economic recovery after the pandemic, among others.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
tgt: Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng emphasized at the forum that digital transformation is the only way for the world and the objective demand for development.
hypo: The Prime Minister, Van敏正， during his speech at the forum, emphasized that digital transformation is the necessary path for the world and the客观需求 of development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
tgt: Digital transformation has become a global problem; digital transformation serves all the people, and therefore it is necessary to motivate all people to participate in it.
hypo: Digital transformation has become a global problem, and it is essential for everyone to participate in the transformation to achieve its goals.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
tgt: People and enterprises are the core, main subject, objective and motive power of digital transformation.
hypo: The people and enterprises are the core，主体， goal and drive of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
tgt: Therefore, all the policies shall be made for the people and enterprises.
hypo: Therefore, all policies must be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
tgt: As emphasized by Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng, digital transformation shall reflect national spirit, with internal force as the core, strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external force as an important breakthrough.
hypo: Prime Minister 范明正 emphasizes that digital transformation requires the expression of our national spirit, which requires both internal and external factors of strength, including strategic, long-term, and decisive factors, while utilizing external forces as important and breakthrough points.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
tgt: He also believed at the same time that digital transformation should drive in-depth and sustainable development; it should participate in the prevention and control of COVID-19, in economic recovery and development, cope with subsequent changes, overcome depletion of natural resources, assist in green transformation and develop green energy.
hypo: He also believes that digital transformation needs to be driven towards further development and sustainable development. It requires participation in the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic, economic recovery and development, dealing with subsequent changes, overcoming the scenario of natural resource depletion, and助力 green transition and the development of green energy.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
tgt: Digital transformation needs to participate in the protection and advocation of the setup of databases including national cultural values, historical traditions as well as local conditions and social customs, to promote digital transformation in fields such as banks, taxes, land management, database development and logistics.
hypo: Digital transformation involves participating in the process of protecting and promoting databases related to national cultural values, historical traditions, and national weather and风土人情， and driving digital transformation in fields such as banking, tax management, land management, and development databases as well as logistics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
tgt: The biggest goal of digital transformation is to make people happier and to make the country increasingly prosperous.
hypo: The biggest goal of digital transformation is to make people more happy and the country more prosperous and developed.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
tgt: Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng required governments and institutions of various levels and enterprises to strengthen leadership and guidance in digital technology development, to improve awareness of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the system about digital transformation, strengthen national management, and to promote the development of digital technology enterprises in the spirit of respect, communication, listening and proactiveness.
hypo: Prime Minister 范明正 requires all levels of government, agencies, and enterprises in the development of digital technology to strengthen leadership and guidance, improve understanding of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve systems related to digital transformation, strengthen national management, and promote企业的发展 through respect, communication, listening, positive and proactive approaches.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
tgt: During the forum, Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng attended the 2021 “Made in Vietnam” excellent digital product awarding ceremony and the opening ceremony of “Made in Vietnam” digital product exposition.
hypo: During the forum, the Prime Minister Van Moch Table attended the award ceremony for the Best Digital Products of越南制造 in 2021 and the opening ceremony of the越南制造 Digital Product exposition.

src: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
tgt: “Smart Hunan” 2021 China International Rail Transport and Equipment Manufacturing Industry Talent Summit opened - Rolling News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online
hypo: The 2021 China International Summit on Train Building and Equipment Industry Careers opened - Real-time News - Hunan Daily News Website - Huasonic Online.

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 周帙恒）9日 ， “ 智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会在株洲开幕。
tgt: Report from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalist: Zhou Zhiheng), on December 9, “Smart Hunan” 2021 China International Rail Transport and Equipment Manufacturing Industry Talent Summit opened in Zhuzhou.
hypo: On December 10th (year-end), (Local Press journalist) Zhou Qihong, according to the press release from the Chinese People's Liberation Army Daily, the 2021 China International Technology and Equipment Education and Training Summit，也被称为“SmartXian” (2021), opened in Zhuzhou, China.

src: 省委常委、省委组织部部长王成出席启动仪式并讲话。
tgt: Wang Cheng, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and Director of the Organization Department of Provincial Party Committee, attended the opening ceremony and delivered a speech.
hypo: Wang Cheng, Minister of the State Council Development and Construction Department, standing, attended the launch ceremony and spoke.

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
tgt: Wang Cheng pointed out that hosting the talent summit was an important measure to implement the spirit of the talent working conference of the central government and the spirit of the 12th Party Congress of Hunan, showing the sincerity of Hunan in terms of putting emphasis on talents, being eager for talents and making full use of talents.
hypo: Wang Cheng pointed out that hosting a talent summit was a significant measure to implement the central talent work conference and the state第十二次 talent study commission meeting spirit, and demonstrated the genuine and heartfelt interest in investing in talent in 湖南.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。
tgt: With the good tradition of recognizing talents, cherishing talents and respecting talents, the wide platforms that assist in talent development and the environmental conditions for realizing beautiful life, Hunan has implemented the talent development strategy in recent years, and has constructed the full-chain talent work pattern by taking Furong talent action plan as the pulling strength, forming the fertile soil for talent growth and achievement, the favored place for innovation and entrepreneurship, and the paradise for living and working.
hypo: 洞庭湖区具有崇尚才德、尊重人才的优良传统，以及广阔的人才发展平台和实现美好生活的环境条件。近年来，该地区实施了人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为引导，构建起全链条人才工作格局，成为人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的幸福之地。

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
tgt: At present, Hunan is comprehensively implementing the “three-high and four-new” strategic positioning and mission tasks, and will further introduce talents, provide more policies for talent innovation and entrepreneurship, concentrate more resources and create better conditions; all excellent talents are welcomed to work towards high-quality development of Hunan.
hypo: Currently，荆楚大地正全力全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步拓宽招贤纳士的广度，出台更优秀的政策、集中更多的资源、创造更好的条件，以期汇聚天下优秀人才，共同推动荆楚大地高质量、可持续发展。

src: 活动现场设置了长沙、株洲、湘潭展馆和湖南自贸试验区展馆，省科技厅、省工信厅、省人社厅发布了先进制造相关产业科技创新重点需求清单、智能制造产业人才需求目录、博士后流动站智能制造产业青年人才需求目录。
tgt: Changsha Exhibition Hall, Zhuzhou Exhibition Hall, Xiangtan Exhibition Hall and Hunan Pilot Free Trade Zone were set on the site of activity, and the List of Key Demands of Scientific and Technological Innovation in Advanced Manufacturing Related Industries, List of Talents Demands of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry, Directory of Talent Demands of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry and Directory of Young Talent Demands of the Postdoctoral Research Station of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry were released by Hunan Department of Science and Technology, Hunan Department of Industry and Information, and Hunan Department of Human Resources and Social Security Bureau.
hypo: The活动现场 established exhibition halls in Changsha, Shaanxi, and Qinghua, and the State Department of Science and Technology, State Industrial Information and Communication, and State Education and Planning Department发布了 the list of key demands for advanced manufacturing related science and technology innovation, the人才需求目录 of the manufacturing intelligent technology industry, and the list of youth talents needs in the manufacturing intelligent technology industry博士后流动站.

src: 中国中车、中联重科、远大科技等48家大型企业现场揽才，近千名相关专业应届毕业生、社会人才参与了人才项目对接。
tgt: 48 large enterprises including CRRC, Zoomlion and Broad Group recruited talents on the site, and nearly one thousand new graduates and social talents of related specialties participated in the talent project.
hypo: 48 large enterprises such as China Zhongcha, Zhonglong Technology, and Xuehong Information Technology recruitment teams visited the site, attracting hundreds of recent college graduates and social talents to participate in talent project matches.

src: 长江干流实现水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖-新华网
tgt: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas has been realized in the main stream of the Yangtze River - Xinhuanet
hypo: The dry course of the Yangtze River has achieved full coverage of an on-water green service area. -新华网

src: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
tgt: Message from Wuhan Xinhua News Agency on December 11 (Reporter: Wang Xian): Chongqing Fuling on-water green comprehensive service area was completed on schedule and put into operation on December 10, which was the 2nd on-water green comprehensive service area officially put into operation on the upper reaches of Yangtze River after the Sichuan Luzhou water green comprehensive service area started operation on December 8.
hypo: Source: https://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2020-12/11/c_1210111374.htm  新华社武汉12月11日电 (记者王贤)重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成并开始运营。这是继四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营8日后，长江上游首个正式运营的水上绿色综合服务区。

src: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。
tgt: Up until now, on-water green comprehensive service areas have covered the upper reaches, the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River.
hypo: 至此，水上绿色综合服务中心已覆盖长江上游、中游和下游。

src: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。
tgt: According to introduction from Qiu Jianhua, deputy director general of Yangtze Navigation Administration Bureau of Ministry of Transport, before that, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu had constructed and put into use 10 on-water green comprehensive service areas in the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River, which had been recognized by sailors and had played an important role in promoting high-quality development of shipping in the Yangtze River.
hypo: The Vice President of the Central Logistics Agency，邱健华， mentioned that before, ten水上 green comprehensive service areas have been constructed and operated by provinces such as湖北，湖南，江西，安徽， and江苏， and have been recognized by the widespread船员 community, playing an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping.

src: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。
tgt: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event for the construction of green shipping of the Yangtze River, which has greatly improved the abilities of pollutant collection and shipping services of the Yangtze River.
hypo: The completion of the surface green comprehensive service area is another milestone event in the construction of green shipping in Yangtze River. The improvement in the port's ability to receive and transport pollution from Yangtze River ships is significant.

src: 据介绍，水上绿色综合服务区是为广大船舶、船员提供全方位生产、生活服务，帮助广大船员解决“急难愁盼”问题的重要设施。
tgt: As introduced, on-water green comprehensive service areas are important facilities that provide ships and sailors with comprehensive production and living services, and help them solve “emergent and difficult” problems.
hypo: According to some sources, the waterborne green overall service zone is an important facility for providing comprehensive production and生活服务 to a large number of ships，船员， and employees. It helps to solve the "emergent and urgent" problems of the large number of employees.

src: 此次建成运行的长江上游两处水上绿色综合服务区，集生活服务、生产服务和政务服务为一体，以绿色环保为主题，以船舶维修与船舶应急救援服务为特色，实现港内船舶“一次靠泊、多项服务 ” ， 将使得常年航行在长江的船员工作更高效、生活更便捷。
tgt: The two newly established on-water green comprehensive service areas in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River are integrated with life services, production services and government services; with environmental protection as the theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the features, they realize “multiple services at an anchoring” along the shore, providing sailors working in the Yangtze River all year long with more efficient work and more convenient life.
hypo: The two green water service areas on the upper reaches of Yangtze River have been built and operate currently, serving as a single entity for生活服务， production services, and government services, with a focus on environmental sustainability. They offer unique services such as boat repair and emergency response services, enabling ships to be泊岸 in the port once and receive multiple services. This will enable船员 who regularly travel through the Yangtze River to work more efficiently and have a more convenient life.

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
tgt: The “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam completed successfully - Xinhuanet
hypo: The "Peaceful rescue - 2021" military security joint演习 of the Chinese and Vietnamese armies has ended. Xinhuanet.

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Hanoi on December 12 (journalists: Zhou Na and Teng Huaijin): in the morning of December 12, all the Chinese squads participating in the “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam returned to Guangxi, China, indicating the successful completion of exercise and training tasks which lasted 7 days.
hypo: According to the official news agency of China，新华社， on December 12th, an all-China team participating in the jointly conducted military police training演习 with the Chinese and越南 armies, "和平救援-2021," returned safely to the border region of Guangxi in the morning. This successful completion of the training mission lasting for seven days represents a great achievement.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
tgt: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam completed joint military health service command, joint field rescue, batched treatment of the wounded and other content according to practical combat standard on the major topic of humanitarian medical assistance and the mission of healing the wounded and rescuing the dying; it effectively improved the military health service support ability of the two armies.
hypo: During this joint exercise, the armies of China and越南 focused on the major issue of人道主义 medical assistance, closely adhering to the mission of field medical treatment. Under the criterion of practical application, the armies of China and越南 completed joint field medical command, joint on-site rescue, and mass patient treatment projects, effectively improving the efficiency of their field medical support capabilities.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
tgt: The results of the exercise have won recognition from both armies of China and Vietnam.
hypo: The results of the simulation have been praised by both the Chinese and越南 military forces.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
tgt: Ruan Xiongsheng, Director of the Exercise Guiding Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director and the Chief of Staff of the Administration of Logistics of People’s Army of Vietnam, said at the ending ceremony that military doctors of Vietnam learned knowledge about exercise organization and specialized activities from military doctors of China, and widened their knowledge of medical and logistics equipment of China.
hypo: 阮雄胜， Chief of the Exercise Guidance Committee of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department, and Joint Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army, said that through the exercise，越南 army doctors had learned about the knowledge of exercise organization and professional activities from Chinese army doctors, and had also seen the medical and保障 equipment of the Chinese side.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
tgt: The achievements made from the exercise proved the specialized ability of military doctors of two countries on medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
hypo: The results of the exercise demonstrate the professional capabilities of the military doctors from both countries in providing medical assistance and controlling epidemic prevention.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
tgt: According to Chen Chunming, leader of Guidance and Coordination Group of China and Deputy Director of Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, the exercise is another pioneering practice based on the joint voluntary clinics event held in 2018, which has an essential milestone significance.
hypo: Chen Chunming, the coordination leader of the Chinese side and the second director of the Health Management section of the military后勤 department, said that this exercise is a further innovative practice based on the successful joint clinical activities in 2018, with significant significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
tgt: During the exercise, Chinese People’s Liberation Army donated health and epidemic prevention materials such as medical masks, medical protective suits and quick nucleic acid detectors to People’s Army of Vietnam.
hypo: During the exercise, the People's Liberation Army Navy donates medical equipment such as organic face masks, organic防护服， and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the越南 People's Army.

src: 先说结论，我个人认为《四海》是一部全方位的烂片，从各种意义上来说都是。
tgt: I will say my conclusion first; I think Only Fools Rush In is utterly a terrible film in any sense.
hypo: I would translate the sentence into English as follows:  "Before I proceed, let me express my opinion: In my personal view, 'Singling out' is a complete waste of time and energy, and can be subjective to various meanings."   fools rush in. (Falsals spring into action.)  In my opinion, 'Singling out' is a complete waste of time and energy, and can be subjective to various meanings.

src: 但你要说这部电影是不是一个亮点也没有，那倒也不是至少配乐选的挺好。
tgt: But it is not without any highlight; at least the music is good.
hypo: But it's not that the movie doesn't have any highlights. At least, the music selection is quite good.

src: 烂片分很多种，让你能在电影院里酣然入睡的算一种，让你看完后义愤填膺的也算一种，《四海》对观众来说就像是峨眉山上的猴子，它能用无数种方式来点燃你的怒火。
tgt: There are many types of terrible films; some make you sleep soundly in the cinema, some make you angry after watching it; Only Fools Rush In is like monkeys on Mount Emei; it can ignite your anger in countless ways.
hypo: bad movies can be categorized into many categories, including those that make you fall asleep in the cinema while watching them. Watching it also makes you angry after it's over. "The Great Buddha" is like a monkey on Mount Fu, which can点燃 your anger in countless ways.

src: 在侮辱观众这点上，韩寒真的是天赋绝伦。
tgt: Han Han is super talented in insulting the audience.
hypo: In terms of侮辱ing the audience，韩寒 truly has the gift of the gods.

src: 这部片子最让人感到痛苦的就是它仿佛是克系小说里的造物，难以名状，漏洞多的就像是小马哥身上的风衣。
tgt: The most painful part of the film is that it is hard to describe like a monster in Cthulhu novels, and has as many loopholes as the holes on the trench coat on Javier Mascherano.
hypo: The only thing that makes this film painful is that it feels like a creation in a Klingon novel, hard to describe, and has many gaps like a coat on Klingon warrior Moff Klingon.

src: 甚至看完后你会怀疑这里面是否有导演暗含的隐喻，但当你仔细思考之后发现它其实就是一坨屎。
tgt: After watching it, you may even wonder if there is metaphors the director planted in it; but you will find that it is only a piece of shit after close examination.
hypo: Even after watching it, you might doubt if there is a director's hidden metaphor, but after careful thinking, you realize it's actually just a pile of dog屎.

src: 先简单的说下我很难理解的一些情节。
tgt: I’ll first briefly talk about some plots that are hard to understand.
hypo: First, let me briefly talk about some scenes that I am difficult to understand.

src: 男主居住地应该是偏南方的某个小岛上，和他的奶奶相依为命。
tgt: The male leading role lives with his grandma on some island in the south.
hypo: The male's residential place should be on a small island in the south, living together with his grandma.

src: 她奶奶有个愿望是想看下雪，然后剧情就安排邻里中的一个大爷开着小面包车送她去东北看雪。
tgt: His grandma has a wish, watching the snow, and the a old male neighbor drove a minibus to take her to watch the snow in the Northeast.
hypo: Her grandmother had a wish to see snow, and the script arranged for a old man in her neighborhood to drive her to the Northeast to see the snow.

src: 高龄老人坐着面包车从南方到东北看雪？？
tgt: An elderly goes to watch the snow in the northeast from the south in a minibus? ?
hypo: An elderly man坐着 a small car from the south to the northeast to see snow?

src: 他和他爹对此还非常放心。
tgt: He and his father were okay with it.
hypo: He and his father are very confident in this matter.

src: 然后这位老人就没下文了。
tgt: And then there is no follow-up on this old lady.
hypo: Then this old man went away without saying anything.

src: 在废弃轮船上开酒店，女主他哥怎么拿到营业执照的？
tgt: Opening a hotel on an abandoned ship; how does the brother of the female leading role get the license?
hypo: How did the女主's brother obtain a business license to open a hotel on an abandoned ship?

src: 岛上飞车党小混混为什么能轻轻松松就把一段山路做到封路？？
tgt: How do the racing bike gang on the island easily block a mountain road? ?
hypo: Why can the small troublemaker from the island's racing bike gang easily block a mountain road?

src: 然后路中间送钢筋的卡车就停在路边，四周连卡车司机都找不到。
