tgt: Then the truck delivering steel bars in the middle of the road just stopped at the roadside, and the truck driver was nowhere to be found.
hypo: Then a truck delivering concrete stopped at the middle of the road, and no one could find the driver anywhere around.

src: 这道具感也太明显了吧。
tgt: They are obviously props.
hypo: This prop is obviously a fake.

src: 一个征信不行的且有违法嫌疑的小混混飞车党为什么会成为一名辅警？
tgt: Why could a little gangster biker with poor credit and who was suspected of breaking the law become an auxiliary policeman?
hypo: Why would a small-timed混子 biker with poor credit become an auxiliary policeman?

src: 面对高利贷为啥不报警，电影里警察还特地问了是否有难处？
tgt: Why didn’t he call the police when there was usury involved, and the police specifically asked if there was any problem.
hypo: Why did you not call the police when you were facing high-interest loans?

src: 一个成年人懂得用智能手机，却不知道在旅馆如何用房卡开门，然后强行安排找不到旅馆老板，坐在房间门外睡一宿？
tgt: An adult who knows how to use smart phone doesn’t know how to use the card to open the door at the hotel, and it was forcefully arranged for him not being able to find the owner of the hotel and so he slept outside the hotel for the night?
hypo: A adult knows how to use a smartphone, but doesn't know how to use a room card to open the door of a hotel, and then is forced to arrange for someone who can't find the hotel owner to sleep outside the room for a night?

src: 这种莫名其妙的情节充斥在整个影片里，由于情节过于离谱以至于我回忆它们时都会令我感到痛苦。
tgt: Such ridiculous plots were everywhere in the film; the plots are so ridiculous that I feel painful when I remember them.
hypo: This bizarre plot is prevalent throughout the entire movie, so bizarre that when I think about it, it causes me to feel pain.

src: 除了情节外，更糟糕的是电影的主旨，或者说这电影根本没有主旨，就是一个面目可憎的缝合怪。
tgt: In addition to the plots, the theme of the film is even more terrible, or you can say there is no theme in the film; it’s just a horrible monster that is stitched together.
hypo: In addition to the plot, what's even worse is the theme of the film, or perhaps it has no theme at all, just a charming, but ultimately meaningless, stitch-up.

src: 影片开头你会以为他想拍个喜剧片，20多分钟后你猜它也许是个励志片，看一半时你觉得它可能是个想体现小镇青年生存不易的剧情片，看完后你就压根也不知道自己究竟看了个啥，随之而来的是对自己深深的怀疑，大过年的为什么要跑到电影院去欣赏大便。
tgt: In the beginning of the film, you may think he wants to make a comedy; after twenty minutes, you may guess it’s an inspiration film; after a half of it, you may think it’s a drama showcasing the hardship of a small town boy; after you watch all of it, you don’t even know what you have watched; what follows is deep doubt in yourself; why would you go to the cinema to watch a piece of shit during the Spring Festival?
hypo: At the beginning of the movie, you would think he wanted to make a comedy film. After 20多 minutes, you would guess it could be a励志 film. When you watch half way, you think it could be a drama film that highlights the challenges of young people in small town life. After watching the movie, you don't even know what you just saw, and then comes a deep怀疑 about yourself, why did you go to the cinema to watch someone enjoying their own asses.

src: 对于大部分人来说其实也都非常熟悉各类电影的套路了，比如你要想拍摩托车手，那就励志＋喜剧然后告诉观众一个有天赋的菜鸟是如何一步步走向成功的。
tgt: Most people are familiar with the routines of various films; for example, if you want to make a film about a biker, then make it an inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented rookie achieves success step by step.
hypo: For most people, they are also familiar with the formula of various films. If you want to make a film about a摩托车手， you can choose a励志+喜剧 genre and tell the audience how an talented beginner gradually rises to success.

src: 如果你想拍爱情片，那你就老老实实讲喜欢骑摩托的小镇青年和服务员妹子之间的恩怨纠葛。
tgt: If you want to make a love film, just tell the story about a small town boy who loves to ride motorcycle and a girl who works as a waitress.
hypo: If you want to make a romantic film, then you can tell the story of the local town boy who enjoys riding his摩托车 and the server's girl.

src: 如果你想反映现实，那最起码你的情节不能出现和正常世界相悖的东西。
tgt: If you want to reflect reality, then the plot should not have anything that is contradictory to the normal world.
hypo: If you want to reflect reality, at the very least your plot should not contain things that are inconsistent with the normal world.

src: （比如尹正演的那个新摩托刚被烧了，然后还能唱歌的角色），就不能去开一些连肯尼迪看了都遭不住的脑洞。
tgt: (Such as the character played by Yin Zheng who sang after his new motorcycle was just burned ) please don’t think about ideas that are ridiculous.
hypo: For example, the new motorcycle that Yin played on was just burned and he could still sing, which led to some imaginative thinking that even肯尼迪 would have been amazed by.

src: 至于女主明明不是弱智可在某些方面表现的就像个5岁小孩，我真不知道这是演技的原因还是导演的要求。
tgt: As for why the female leading role acts like a five-year-old child when she is not retarded at all, I really don’t know if there is problem with her acting or it was demanded by the director.
hypo: Regarding the actress, who isn't actually智力低下 yet在某些方面表现出来 like a five-year-old, I couldn't determine if it was due to her acting or if it was导演's request.

src: 还有一点我也挺想不明白，韩寒作为一个赛车手为什么这么热衷于在他自己的电影里添加撞车情节？
tgt: And one more thing I don’t understand is why Han Han as a racer is so keen on adding the plot of car crash in his films?
hypo: Another thing I'm curious about is why韩寒， as a racer, is so keen to include racing scenes in his movies?

src: 这样的电影安排在春节档里，难道是为了给观众添堵吗？
tgt: Is such a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to humiliate the audience?
hypo: Is this film being arranged just to cause chaos for viewers?

src: 感谢今天的支持者，80盒全部送出去了！
tgt: Thank you to all the supporters today; all 80 boxes have been given out!
hypo: Thank you for your支持者 today! All 80 packages have been sent out!

src: 美容养颜汤的材料：
tgt: Ingredients of beauty soup:
hypo: The material for a beautiful mind soup:

src: 白木耳的作用：味甘、性平，归肺、胃、肾经；有强精、补肾、润肠、益胃、补气、和血、强心、滋阴、润肺、生津、壮身、补脑、提神、美容、嫩肤、延年益寿之功效；用于治肺热咳嗽、肺燥干咳、妇女月经不调、胃炎、大便秘结等病症；对阴虚火旺不受参茸等温热滋补的病人是一种良好的补品
tgt: Functions of tremella: sweet in taste and neutral in nature, belong to channels of lung, stomach and kidney, have the effects of strengthening sperm, tonifying kidney, moistening intestine, nourishing stomach, tonifying vitality and blood, strengthening heart, nourishing yin, moistening lungs, promoting secretion, strengthening body, tonifying brain, refreshing beauty, tendering skin and prolonging life; it is used for treatment of diseases such as lung-heat type cough, dry-lung cough, menstrual irregularity of women, gastritis and constipation; it is a good tonic for patients with excessive heat and yin deficiency but are not suitable for warm tonic such as ginseng and velvet antler.
hypo: The function of white木耳： its taste is sweet and its water content is normal, it belongs to the lung, stomach, and human tail; it has the ability to strengthen the sex organ, nourish the lung, improve stomach health, fill the hole, harmonize blood, support the brain，提神， improve beauty, and aging prevention; it is suitable for treating steamy lung cough, dry cough with no fever, women's irregular menstrual cycle, stomach flu, and便秘； it is a good supplement for people who have low blood pressure and cannot be treated with spices and other温暖的滋补品.

src: 桃胶的作用：味苦，性平，归大肠，膀胱经。
tgt: Functions of peach glue: bitter in taste, mild in nature, belong to the large intestine and bladder channels.
hypo: The function of peach fuzz: bitter，性平， belong to the liver, and is located in the big intestine, during the process of Xie He.

src: 功效：和血，通淋，止痢，止痛，也可以补水，润肠，如果有便秘的人，可以多吃桃胶。
tgt: Effects: tonify blood, dredge lymph, stop dysentery and pain, replenish water, moisten intestines; people with constipation can eat more peach glue.
hypo: The purpose: To relieve blood flow, clear粪便， prevent diarrhea, and alleviate pain. It can also improve water retention. If someone has constipation, they can eat more pomegranate seeds.

src: 枸杞子的作用：性平，味甘，归肝，胃经。
tgt: Effect of fruits of Chinese wolfberries: neutral in nature and sweet in taste, belonging to the channels of liver and stomach.
hypo: The effect of 枸杞子： having a moderate taste, being rich in taste, going to the肝脏， and flowing to the stomach.

src: 益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。
tgt: Nourish the liver and the eyes, tonify the liver and the kidney, whiten and nourish the skin, nourish deficiency, produce secretion and delay aging.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation for the sentence:  "益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。"  Here are the translations:  "益肝明目： nutritious vegetables for the liver and kidney."  "滋补肝肾： feed the liver and kidney with nutritious foods."  "美白养颜： improve skin brightness and appearance with natural ingredients."  "补虚生津： nourish the liver with omega-3 fatty acids."  "延缓衰老： slow down the aging process with nutritious foods and lifestyle changes."

src: 红枣的作用：味甘，性平，归脾，胃经，有补脾和胃，益气生津养血安神，如果脾胃虚弱，气血不足失眠者可以多服用红枣。
tgt: Functions of red dates: sweet in taste, calm in nature, return to the spleen, go through stomach channel, tonify the spleen and stomach, replenish qi, generate fluid, nourish blood and calm nerves; people whose spleen and stomach are weak, whose Qi and blood are insufficient, and who suffer from insomnia can eat more red dates.
hypo: The effect of 太阳枣： It is sweet and has a medium flavor, belongs to the liver and stomach, helps to nourish the stomach and liver, and nourishes blood and qi. For people with poor liver and stomach function and lack of blood qi, it is recommended to consume more 太阳枣.

src: 龙眼肉的作用：味甘性温，归心,脾经，适用于心脾两虚者。
tgt: Functions of arillus gongan: sweet in taste, warm in nature, return to the heart, spleen channel, suitable for those with deficiency of both heart and spleen.
hypo: The function of 龙眼肉： its taste is sweet and warm, it belongs to the heart and spleen, and is suitable for those with both heart and spleen虚弱.

src: 龙眼肉还能润肤美容，养血安神,,补益心脾，壮阳益气，贫血的人也适合服用，失眠者也适合。
tgt: Arillus gongan can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood and calm the nerves, tonify the heart and spleen, invigorate Yang and Qi, and is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.
hypo: Dragonfruit flesh can also nourish the skin and Beauty, strengthen the heart and imagination, nourish the liver and kidney, and support the function of the imagination, too. It is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.

src: 莲子的作用：味甘涩，性平，归心，脾，肾经。
tgt: Functions of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in taste, flat in nature, return to heart, spleen and kidney channels.
hypo: The function of 莲子 is: it is sweet and astringent, with a moderate temperature, returning to the heart，脾， and human traffic law.

src: 养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。
tgt: Nourish the heart and calm the nerves, treat palpitations, insomnia, stomach deficiency, forgetfulness, vexation and thirstiness, nourish and replenish deficiency, and prevent spermatorrhea and premature ejaculation.
hypo: Cultivate good spermatorrhea, cause panic attacks, have insomnia, become forgetful, have口渴 and constipation, nourish and replenish, stop insomnia and spermatorrhea.

src: 因此，这个养颜美容汤不仅是一道甜品，而且还可以养生！
tgt: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also helps you stay healthy!
hypo: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert but also can be a healthy choice!

src: 多吃，能使您心神安康！
tgt: Eating more can make you healthy both physically and mentally!
hypo: Eating more can make you feel well- balanced and calm!

src: 而且又不会像燕窝那么贵，多吃不会使你口袋破大洞！
tgt: Plus, it won't be as expensive as bird’s nest, so eating a lot will not make you spend a lot!
hypo: Moreover, it is not as expensive as 燕窝 and will not cause your wallet to fill up with holes!

src: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
tgt: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.
hypo: I want to try playing tennis, but I am afraid I won't stick with it, so I want to start by finding a price that is about right to practice with.

src: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
tgt: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.
hypo: Unfriendly, actually, the price is often proportional to the degree offriendliness. If one cannot distinguish, then in normal cases, the cheaper相机 will be more friendly. These "beginner cameras" are actually industrial垃圾.

src: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
tgt: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.
hypo: They have very low strength, and when the ball hits the拍子， there is a very large vibration. The hard balls cannot handle it, and even high-level players have a difficult time handling it.

src: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
tgt: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.
hypo: The logic and subtext behind their existence are：网球 is so difficult, knowing that you don't want to learn it and also that you don't have the courage to buy a expensive one. So, they will provide you with a cheaper one, and you can play it twice before giving up. Since the ball is cheaper, you don't mind taking it.

src: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
tgt: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
hypo: Once you really can distinguish good from bad, it means you have progress. When you come here and buy the expensive thing again, I will earn twice the money.

src: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
tgt: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
hypo: It's recommended to buy a used or second-hand good拍子 for similar prices, choose Prince or邓禄普's, as these two brands are quite unknown, so good拍子 don't sell for a high price. A new one cost about 500 or 600, and a used one cost only 200. How about enjoying the experience of having a 1000-level camera?

src: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
tgt: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
hypo: The new user is quite friendly, but after the beginner stage, it becomes "dreadful" for most people, especially girls, because they cannot pass the beginner stage easily.

src: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
tgt: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
hypo: The十八届“世界饮料创新奖”(World Beverage Innovation Awards) was jointly awarded by FoodBev Media and the在德国纽伦堡召开的国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会(Brau Beviale).

src: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
tgt: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
hypo: The competition attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 different categories.

src: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
tgt: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
hypo: On October 15th, the list of candidates for the final round was announced. The final winners' list will be published online on November 11th ( British Summer Time ).

src: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
tgt: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
hypo: We can see that Liaoning Green Forest's LP28 No-sugar Milk坚守乳饮料提名最佳乳饮料奖， Liuyue Anmu希的"GOGO武汉" marketing campaign提名最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的容器还提名最佳包装设计/标签奖.

src: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
tgt: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
hypo: Laura Nettle，高级市场营销总监 of FoodBev Media, expressed her pleasure to celebrate the 18th annual World beverage Innovation Award with Brau Beviale.

src: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
tgt: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
hypo: From new flavors, new concepts, and new functions to brand, packaging, and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen trends in the beverage industry.

src: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
tgt: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
hypo: The World Food Innovation Prize celebrated the most ambitious new products and developments in the global food industry this year among both old and new brands.

src: 以下是每个类别的决赛入围者的完整榜单。
tgt: Here is the complete list of all the finalists of each category.
hypo: Below is the complete list of candidates for the决赛 in each category.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by the Ardagh Group可以将 100% recycled glass重新 melted and formed into new bottles.

src: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
tgt: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.
hypo: In the warehouse, water packets can be packed in bags. By using 100% recyclable packaging, it can reduce packaging materials by 66%, and reduce carbon emissions by 97%.

src: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
tgt: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.
hypo: LatCub is 100% bio降解 and uses less paper, without harmful glue or tape.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by the Ardagh Group can fully recycled glass and reprocessed into new瓶子.

src: 最终获奖名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）在FoodBev Media的 YouTube频道公布，FBIF将持续为您报道，敬请期待！
tgt: The final list of the winners will be published on the YouTube channel of FoodBev Media on November 11 (BTS), and FBIF will continue to report for you, so stay tuned!
hypo: The final list of names will be announced on FoodBev Media's YouTube channel on November 11th ( British Summer Time ), and FBIF will continue to report on it. Look forward to it!

src: 2021年什么最火？
tgt: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
hypo: What was the most popular in 2021?

src: 无疑是东京奥运会。
tgt: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
hypo: It is undoubtedly the东京奥运.

src: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
tgt: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
hypo: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win a prize?

src: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
tgt: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
hypo: A recent article titled "See! Project managers can冲击 gold!" was very popular, which mentioned that project managers in many projects are definitely first in their own right, without any competition: carrying bricks, traveling, and staying up late are the daily habits of project managers, and handling emergency situations，背锅， and apologizing are not far behind.

src: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
tgt: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
hypo: A seemingly joking and humorous article, yet reveals the daily struggles of project managers, who represent the insufficient strength in their current project management work.

src: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
tgt: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
hypo: However, those involved in project management gradually began to choose to摆脱 their working困境 through some actions.

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
tgt: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
hypo: According to the annual increase in PMP (International Certified Project Management Professional) registrations, an increasing number of project management professionals are seeking to improve their project management skills through learning.

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
tgt: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
hypo: According to the "二十年发展报告 of China's project management (1999-2019):” By September 2019, the total number of PMP® registrations across the country was nearly 60,000,000, with approximately 4.2 million passing the PMP® certification, and approximately 3 million effective registered holders. This accounted for 31.2% of the total global PMP® registered population.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
tgt: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
hypo: The number of PMP certified project managers has grown every year over the past decade, indicating that more and more project managers are realizing that relying solely on past "established practices" is no longer feasible. The rapidly changing work environment reminds us that we must learn to step up and take advantage of scientific advancements to explore new paths forward.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
tgt: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
hypo: However, does having a PMP certification ensure that project management tasks are completely free from obstacles?

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
tgt: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
hypo: Many new project management beginners claim that by studying PMP/IPMP-related courses, they can systematically master the related concepts of the ten fields and five process groups of project management. However, when it comes to actually managing projects, there still seems to be a lot of confusion.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
tgt: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
hypo: Many project managers often feedback on the following issues: lack of understanding of project management, relying solely on personal experience, having theoretical knowledge of project management but no practical way to apply it; lack of support for a well- established project management process and system, making it difficult to put things into practice, making poor project estimations, poor control and responsiveness to changes, and causing delays in the project; unclear team assignments and " veteran" team members who do not know how to respond to this, causing communication between departments to be inefficient, making it difficult to move forward with the project...

src: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
tgt: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
hypo: Therefore, with ten years of focus on innovation and product innovation，中天华夏咨询 has helped numerous outstanding enterprises cultivate a large number of development key personnel, including product managers and project managers. This organization has also been named the "Training Center for China Enterprise Development Management Key personnel" and received various titles such as "Product Management Trainee Program for China Enterprise". At the same time, the online course "Development Project Manager Training Program" of Sinotrans华夏咨询 is here.

src: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
tgt: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
hypo: The "Special Training Course for Research and Development Project Manager" online course is a way of online 碎片化 learning that combines practical cases, tools, and methods from numerous research and development enterprises. It helps you master the essential knowledge and standard actions of project managers and embark on an advanced journey in your own project management.

src: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
tgt: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
hypo: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to use lower costs and less investment to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to the company.

src: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
tgt: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
hypo: Let's first see how other students have评价 this course: This course is not only led by the Zhongshan Chinese expertise team (formerly the华为 Research and Development management team), which combines international advanced project management methodologies with real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises. It provides in-depth professional explanation of the course content.

src: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
tgt: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
hypo: We will also provide scientific and practical management tools and methods, rich template forms, and help students transform the learning content into practical applications after class.

src: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
tgt: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
hypo: claims to be the largest exhaust sound of supercar in the new mountain district!

src: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
tgt: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!
hypo: This vehicle that our team brings you this time is a dream for many men!

src: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
tgt: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!
hypo: It isLamborghini's flagship supercar, the upcoming replacement for the Murcielago - the Aventador LP700-4!

src: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
tgt: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
hypo: The price is nearly 2 million马币， and the road tax is about 10,000马币 per year. It has four wheels and is called LP700. What is the reason for its name?

src: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
tgt: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
hypo: Can you imagine how fast it is with 700 horse power?

src: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
tgt: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
hypo: Oh, I forget, just thought it was interesting.

src: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
tgt: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.
hypo: The low-hanging body，嚣张 scissors doors, giant进气口 scattered throughout the body, and a 6.5 v12 engine underneath the glass perfectly embody the style ofLamborghini.

src: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
tgt: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is: "There's not much need to explain the car model; just Google it and you'll get some解说s that Google may not be able to provide!"

src: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
tgt: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)
hypo: Being too备受瞩目， where you go, everyone is looking at, it's uncomfortable! (Actually, it's a little exciting).

src: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
tgt: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)
hypo: The English translation for this sentence is: 1km's fuel cost is around RM1左右 (the owner wouldn't care).

src: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
tgt: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).
hypo: Practice the way you go out and into the car, or you might feel a bit embarrassed (since you might get stuck halfway inside the car and become stuck).

src: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
tgt: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)
hypo: The engine sound was too loud, and after getting off the car, I felt like I had just hit a聋子. (But still, it was very enjoyable.)

src: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
tgt: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!
hypo: The car's body is too large, and parking it at a normal停车位 will be too narrow. I am afraid I will be hit by the door opening of the neighboring car!

src: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
tgt: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)
hypo: A little lonely, because there's no one else on the road (this is a小编's personal saying, and it's unrelated to car owners, ha ha).

src: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
tgt: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!
hypo: Please don't misunderstood, this video's supercar is not for sale, sorry!

src: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！
tgt: Please contact us if you want to take a video for your car!
hypo: "Take a look at our website: <https://www.youtube.com/com/FangYi1991>"

src: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志
tgt: Know more about cars, come to The Car Guide.
hypo: The Car Guide / People's Car Journal

src: 牽扯到价值千万的车祸！
tgt: A car crash involving tens of millions!
hypo: 扯到千万价值的车祸！

src: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
tgt: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!
hypo: I believe that friends of the car community know about the Bugatti Chiron, which is one of the most expensive supercars in the world. And while the Porsche 911 is also a premium vehicle, its price tag reaches into the millions!

src: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
tgt: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!
hypo: Just a few minutes ago, overseas crashed a million-dollar sports car, the 911, as well as a ten thousand-dollar supercar, the Chiron!

src: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
tgt: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!
hypo: It's clear from the results that the price is justified!

src: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
tgt: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.
hypo: concept has emerged in the加密 community.

src: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
tgt: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
hypo: In 2021, a blockchain game called "Axie Infinity" had a huge impact in the Southeast Asian region. People who had lost their job机会 due to the COVID-19 pandemic started to earn a stable income through this game.

src: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
tgt: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
hypo: Axie Infinity is a pet养成 game that is built on blockchain technology, which集合s a variety of玩法， including NFTs. It is currently the most expensive NFT project with over $3 billion in total transaction value as of today.

src: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
tgt: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.
hypo: TokenTerminal's statistics show that the daily income of Axie Infinity has exceeded $8.2 million, reaching levels similar to the popular mobile game "Honor of Kings."

src: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
tgt: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.
hypo: On August 6th, Axie Infinity's official website reported that the daily active users have surpassed one million.

src: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
tgt: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
hypo: The popularity of Axie Infinity will help to spread a new "play to earn" model to more people. With the help of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer just one role. In addition to obtaining fun and economic benefits from the game, they can also participate in the governance of the game ecosystem.

src: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
tgt: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
hypo: This sense of ownership is not granted by the game developers, but is guaranteed by blockchain technology.

src: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
tgt: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
hypo: When I read about a news item about a friend's stock price, my biggest impression was that companies choose the track, which refers to the choice of investment-grade industries. Firstly, they choose industries with a large growth potential, with a market size of at least 1 billion以上. Secondly, they choose industries with good future growth prospects, considering the best state of growth in industry 3-5 years from now. Lastly, they choose industries with government support.

src: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
tgt: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
hypo: The width of the track refers to the market size, the length of the track refers to the stage of development of the industry, and whether the track is flat or rugged refers to the competitive landscape of the industry.

src: 为对的赛道加油！
tgt: Cheer for the right track!
hypo: Cheer for the right track!

src: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
tgt: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
hypo: In the new year, the first thing to do is summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout for 2022.

src: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
tgt: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
hypo: The tactics involve making things right, which means doing the right thing.

src: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
tgt: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
hypo: The strategy在于 "do the right thing", that is, to do the right thing.

src: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
tgt: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
hypo: Strategy lies in finding direction, tactics lie in getting it done, and there is space for strategic thinking above most tactical considerations.

src: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
tgt: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
hypo: above how to increase customer numbers (strategy thinking), you can think about whether it's best to deepen current areas or extend them horizontally (strategy thinking); above improving customer retention rate (strategy thinking), you can think about how to improve the retention rate of core customers and high-value customers; above improving engagement rates (strategy thinking), you can consider how to set appropriate engagement KPIs and achieve appropriate engagement targets, such as improving engagement rates of target customers，激活 high-value silent customers, and accurately recruiting new customers; above improving daily active users (strategy thinking), you can consider whether current growth is healthy and sustainable.

src: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
tgt: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
hypo: Since it was born 12 years ago, Bitcoin has experienced several milestone events in 2021.

src: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
tgt: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
hypo: On September 7th，萨尔瓦多， a small country in Central America, designated Bitcoin as legal tender, the first time Bitcoin became a legal tender in a country or region.

src: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
tgt: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
hypo: On October 12th, for the first time in eight years, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved ProShares to launch a Bitcoin ETF and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). This marks the launch of the first compliant Bitcoin futures ETF in the United States资本市场， and a further expansion of the 加密货币 investment exposure.

src: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
tgt: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
hypo: From the perspective of blockchain technology development, Bitcoin is not the main player.

src: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
tgt: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
hypo: Bitcoin did a soft split升级， named "Taproot," on November 14th, 2021, which improved the anonymity of network transactions and reduced the data burden of transactions by changing the本身的 data structure of blocks.

src: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
tgt: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
hypo: Have you encountered any learning curve issues during your primary cost initial registration?

src: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
tgt: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
hypo: Overdue registration personnel did not provide proof of continuous learning. For re-registration, personnel must provide proof of at least 30 hours of continuous learning within the last year. For re-registration, personnel must provide proof of at least 120 hours of continuous learning over the past 4 years. For re-registration, personnel must provide proof of at least 30 hours of continuous learning per year for each year they remain registered.

src: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
tgt: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
hypo: Standards for ongoing education for cost工程师

src: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
tgt: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
hypo: For cost engineers who participate in online continuing education, they must pay the learning fees when they register. The standard rate in general is: the cost of a 30-hour course is $300/person per year (including a unified curriculum for ongoing education).

src: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
hypo: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person/year.

src: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
hypo: The cost of 30-hour必修课程 and 30-hour elective courses per person per year is 600 yuan (including unified textbooks for further education).

src: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
tgt: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
hypo: (一) Attend register造价工程师 online further education courses organized by China price Association or各省级和部门管理机构， and calculate the learning hours based on the time recorded in online courseware.

src: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
tgt: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (二) Cost engineers can participate in centralized classroom training organized by either the Central Association of Cost Engineers or local regional and departmental management agencies, and various types of training courses and seminars. Each half-day can be recognized with 4 learning hours.

src: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
tgt: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (iii) Attend continuing education courses offered by the China Pricing Association, and cost engineers from levels below that of the National and departmental level, and cost officers. Each half-day can be recognized with 10 learning hours.

src: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
tgt: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: (四) Attend the study group conducted by the Chinese Association of Vegetable Prices and the level-set National Standardization Research, prepare standard textbooks, and assign 30 study hours per year to each item.

src: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
tgt: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: (六) Developing and designing the教材 for the national cost工程师执业资格考试， as well as organizing, grading, and reviewing questions.每年认定30学时；

src: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
tgt: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
hypo: (七) Professional papers and works on cost accounting, with personal signature and published (as indicated by official journal issues).

src: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
tgt: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
hypo: Each million words in a published book is认定 worth 12 lessons.

src: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
tgt: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
hypo: 发论文 published in national-level journals receive 8 hours of training, papers published in regional-level journals receive 5 hours of training, and papers published in local-level journals receive 3 hours of training per 千字.

src: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
tgt: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
hypo: (九) 公开培训 organized by professional Price Management Consulting Firms approved or授权 by China Pricing Association, regional governments and their technical management agencies, and regional price management associations can be held for the whole community (except for general corporate management and training skills). Each half can be recognized with 4 hours, and up to a maximum of 30 hours can be recognized per year.

src: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
tgt: Process of cost engineer online further education
hypo: The Process of Online Continuous Education for Cost Accountants.

src: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
tgt: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
hypo: After the tuition fee is received by the registered institution, the student identity is automatically established, and cost engineers can enter online education classrooms through their username and password.

src: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
tgt: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
hypo: The learners learn through various methods such as on-demand course materials, questions and answers, and online discussions.

src: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
tgt: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
hypo: If you forget your password and try to log in, the username and password are not correct, and you are unable to log in, please contact the student's registered institution. The registered institution can assist in modifying the student's password (but cannot modify the username). Use the modified password to log in again.

src: 扫二维码下载贴吧客户端
tgt: Scan QR code to download Tieba app
hypo: Click the二维码 to download the Tieba app.

src: 看高清直播、视频！
tgt: Watch HD live broadcast and videos!
hypo: Watch high definition live streaming and videos!

src: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
tgt: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
hypo: In September 2020, Mr. Liu learned about a factory site located in Zhangting Village, Yuyao, from a real estate agent. After viewing the site several times, Mr. Liu decided to purchase the factory.

src: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
tgt: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
hypo: In December of that year, Mr. Lu consulted with the family of the owner of the factory, Lin, regarding the details of the purchase of the factory. After discussing it, he sent 20 million yuan through a bank transfer as a down payment on that day.

src: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
tgt: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
hypo: Lin某， as the收款 person, signed the "Promised Pre-money Damages Payment Note" as the payee, which stated, "If the buyer does not want to buy the plant, this定金 shall be returned to the seller. If the seller is unwilling to sell the plant, the定金 will be twice returned to the seller. The parties have agreed to sign the contract for the plant within one week."

src: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
tgt: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
hypo: However, after several months of discussions, the parties were unable to reach a consensus on the main contract terms such as the sale scope and payment terms, leading to a delay in the signing of the house buying contract.

src: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
tgt: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
hypo: Considering that the parties couldn't reach a common understanding on the contract terms, a few days later, Lin某 returned the 20 million advance to Mr. Lu.

src: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
tgt: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
hypo: After working hard to find a house that he finally purchased, he had paid the down payment and had the closing costs ready. Just when it seemed like he had reached the final step to sign the contract, the seller refused to sell. This made Mr. Li frustrated and angry.

src: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
tgt: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
hypo: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。   decided to bring a case against Lin某 to the余姚市人民法院.

src: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
tgt: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
hypo: The court considered that the parties ultimately failed to sign a formal contract, which cannot be attributed solely to the defendant, and should be reasonabledly considered as a failure for consultation. Therefore, the penalty of deposit should not be applied in this case, and the defendant is not required to bear the违约责任 of返还 double the deposit.

src: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
tgt: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
hypo: After the first judgment, the plaintiff filed an appeal.

src: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
tgt: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
hypo: Recently, the Second Court upheld the original judgment.

src: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
tgt: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
hypo: 【Lawyer's advice】 Be mindful of your necessary prudence in the trading process.

src: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
tgt: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
hypo: When signing a contract, the buyer should perform the necessary responsible attention obligations, such as verifying the information of the owner of the property, whether it is being occupied, and other relevant information, and clarify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract in order to avoid disputes between the two parties when履行合同.

src: 你叫郑眠，这是你搬来日本的第二周。
tgt: Your name is Zheng Mian, and this is the second week since you’ve moved to Japan.
hypo: You name is Zheng Mian, and this is the second week that you have been living in Japan.

src: 你走在街上，突然发现有人跟着你，你害怕地越走越快，最后跑了起来。
tgt: You were walking on the street when suddenly you found someone following you; you got scared and you were walking faster and faster and at last running.
hypo: You walk down the street and at last, found someone following you.

src: 那人在你身后追：“小姐！请等等！”（全程日文对话） 你在便利店门口停下了脚步。
tgt: The one chased behind you, “miss!” Please wait! “(Japanese dialogue) You stopped in front of a convenience store.
hypo: The person behind you is chasing you: "Ms. please wait!" (全程日文对话)   You stop at the convenience store's entrance.

src: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
tgt: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”
hypo: "小姐......I am a director, I think you look very beautiful. Are you interested in participating in reality TV?"

src: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
tgt: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.
hypo: You might be confused and afraid that this is a scam.

src: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
tgt: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.
hypo: He handed you a business card, and you found out that he was actually a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.

src: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
tgt: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”
hypo: If missie has time, we can talk about the price in the company. The pay will definitely not be insufficient.

src: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
tgt: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.
hypo: You followed him to the company, and he said that he saw you right away on the street and very much wanted you to be there.

src: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
tgt: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.
hypo: You signed the contract because you thought there would be no loss and you could still make money.

src: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
tgt: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.
hypo: This is a large dating reality show that consists of two parts.

src: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
tgt: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.
hypo: In the early stage, it will allow stars and normal people to interact with each other in reality and cultivate cooperation.

src: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
tgt: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.
hypo: In the later stage, we will enter into a jointly competitive game.

src: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
tgt: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.
hypo: Next week, the official shooting will start. You don't know who your partner will be. What might happen interesting?

src: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
tgt: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.
hypo: I accidentally saw an article discussing why this customer wanted the logistics company inside the customs bond warehouse to help with packaging. Although packaging is a deep-level transaction and does not fall within the scope of the customs bond logistics company, this following article may explain why the customer wants to do this.

src: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
tgt: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.
hypo: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and been in contact with many milk powder production lines.

src: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.
hypo: In fact, the raw materials for packet and听装奶粉 are exactly the same, there is no difference between them.

src: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
tgt: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?
hypo: Then you may question why the保质期 of bags is one year while the保质期 of listen装的 is two years or even longer.

src: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
tgt: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?
hypo: Or, why is the price so different between bag and听装？

src: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
tgt: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.
hypo: In fact, many consumers, especially mothers, believe that due to the different raw materials, the quality will be much better.

src: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.
hypo: In fact, the raw materials are the same, but people think that the expensive ones are better.

src: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
tgt: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!
hypo: There are also consumers who after eating the听装 product react saying that the taste or flavor of the listening装 is different!

src: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
tgt: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.
hypo: Now, I will explain to you why hearing aids are expensive. What are the reasons?

src: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
tgt: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?
hypo: Why are the prices so different when they have the same raw materials?

src: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
tgt: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?
hypo: Because manufacturers consider when pricing their一袋 products that if the prices are too high, consumers may not be able to accept them, which means that their profit margin is very low or there is no profit. What are manufacturers going to rely on to survive?

src: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
tgt: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.
hypo: Therefore, they have a large increase in the price for listen-in attendees to ensure their profit margins.

src: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
tgt: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.
hypo: Therefore, most manufacturers prefer listening装 instead of袋形.

src: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
tgt: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.
hypo: And how come so many manufacturers need to spend millions or billions of dollars on advertising every year?

src: 大家可想而知。
tgt: Everyone knows it.
hypo: Everyone can imagine.

src: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
tgt: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.
hypo: As society develops, marketing promotion expenses, such as store personnel promoting products in the store, display costs, product gift cards, and advertising expenses, also continue to increase.

src: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
tgt: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.
hypo: Therefore, each manufacturer is constantly adding new products, including ear-shaped headphones, and their prices are also constantly rising. Actually, these are new products that are released as market costs increase.

src: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
tgt: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.
hypo: The main purpose is to gain higher profits, and the increased cost of their raw materials will be no more than 3 or 4 yuan.

src: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
tgt: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.
hypo: Another part of the brands, in order to promote their products, are not hesitate to use any means necessary, linking them with doctors in hospitals, and协助 their product promotion, with varying profit margins from 30 dollars to 80 dollars per bottle.

src: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
tgt: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.
hypo: China's relevant laws strictly prohibit such operations and methods, which actually harm consumers.

src: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
tgt: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.
hypo: We suggest buying一袋袋的奶粉 in cans, which can be装入罐中， under the condition that we have cans at home, to save money, while increasing the preservation and integrity of the奶粉， without any impact on children.

src: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
tgt: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.
hypo: Also, don't think that bag-in-box保质期 is longer than bag-on-box. If the bag is opened, the保质期 of bag-in-box and bag-on-box are the same. It just means that the bag-on-box after opening is less easy to store and can become变质 if it is受潮.

src: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
tgt: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.
hypo: I just saw an article about period, it's too long.

src: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
tgt: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.
hypo: I am a language model and do not have the ability to browse the internet. Please provide me with the translation of your text that you would like me to translate into English.

src: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
tgt: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.
hypo: Most girls experience their first period suddenly on a day between the ages of 13 and 15, and start menopause at around 50 years old.

src: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
tgt: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.
hypo: Assuming good health, it will occur regularly once a month.

src: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
tgt: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.
hypo: However, it's not规律 enough to predict with accuracy. There is a variation of around a week, and you need to prepare in advance. Sometimes, even if you have a bad luck, you'll fall short (他突然提前了好几天).

src: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
tgt: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.
hypo: The duration, amount, and degree of menstrual cramps vary from person to person. Some people experience it for only three days, while others have a heavy cramp that lasts for a week. Some people have little reaction, while others suffer from severe cramping. Some people have no reaction, while others can't move or feel any pain until the救护车 arrives. menstrual cramps can change over time, and not feeling them in the past does not necessarily mean they won't happen again in the future.

src: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
tgt: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.
hypo: menstrual bleeding is not controlled and lasts for 24 hours from the start to the end of the period, and there is only one thing to do: use menstrual cups or卫生棉条 to absorb the blood and prevent it from flowing onto clothes or onto the椅子.

src: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
tgt: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.
hypo: dysmenorrhea mainly due to the分泌 oferperal素. When the menstrual cycle starts and dysmenorrhea has not yet occurred, taking ibuprofen can effectively manage the symptoms for the当月. However, it is not helpful for treating dysmenorrhea once it begins.

src: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
tgt: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.
hypo: Before the menstrual cycle, there is a risk of腹泻 due to excessive uterine congestion and前列腺素 release.

src: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
tgt: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.
hypo: If you're around your menstrual cycle, you might suddenly have diarrhea. Generally, it will happen within two days.

src: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
tgt: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.
hypo: It is best to change your pad two to three hours before bedtime, as not changing them often enough can promote细菌 growth. In addition to睡眠时间， the worst-case scenario is to change six times a day, which means 42 pads in a month, even if you have 7 days of use per month. If you already have 50 pads pre-准备好了， that would be 50 more, not one per month.

src: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
tgt: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)
hypo: 卫生棉条 do not need to be changed frequently, it can be changed every大约 five to six hours or as long as eight hours.

src: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
tgt: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.
hypo: The menstrual period can be particularly脾气暴躁， and during the ovulation period, the changes in hormones can cause emotional不稳定. It's quite unfortunate that your body is prone to causing yourself trouble.

src: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
tgt: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.
hypo: However, official crime data can still show that women's ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make any excuses for emotional problems.

src: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
tgt: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.
hypo: The bleeding does not only consist of blood, but also includes能够让子宫内膜脱落.

src: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
tgt: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.
hypo: The endometrial lining after ovulation is the thinnest, and it gradually thickens over the next few days. This can be interpreted as the uterus being a building site, where the endometrial lining is built up and prepared for a guest (ovulation). If the guest doesn't show up, the entire building ( endometrial lining) can be拆除 (ovulation排出) in the next month, and a new building can be constructed, repeating the process every month.

src: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
tgt: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?
hypo: Having a menstrual cycle is not convenient. It happens every few months for decades, and it can cause periods that last for several days, with ongoing bleeding, pain, and discomfort. Who would want to go through that?

src: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
tgt: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.
hypo: But people can be born because their mother was born, and her period is preparation for the house you will stay for 10 months when you first come to this world. We should thank our mother for having a regular and healthy period.

src: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
tgt: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.
hypo: In the past, many things about women were suppression, society brain washed women into thinking that they were dirty and ashamed, and people thought that was the way it was. However, times have changed.

src: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
tgt: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?
hypo: If someone finds it恶心 to have a menstrual cycle and believes the preparing actions of a female body for pregnancy are恶心， it is not appropriate to speak out in public. Women's children should stand up and stop thinking that way. Men who have never experienced or are not familiar with it should not say such thing. Such a mentality is not worthy of facing one's mother and having a child. How can one have the courage to have a child with such a mentality?

src: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
tgt: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.
hypo: Finally, sisters, try卫生棉条吧，它们真的非常有效！

src: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
